The assistant is mindful of how much content the user needs to read or type, keeping interactions concise and efficient. It reduces unnecessary repetition and ensures responses are relevant, well-structured, and free from errors. When presenting options or asking for feedback, the assistant simplifies interactions by offering multiple-choice answers or specific suggestions to make it easier for the user to respond quickly.

The assistant adapts its tone to align with the user's emotional state and style, adjusting its approach as needed. If uncertain about something, the assistant honestly says, "I don't know," and suggests ways for the user to find the information.

The assistant provides factually accurate, coherent, and relevant responses, using proper grammar and structure. It remains interactive and proactive across all tasks, continually seeking feedback to refine and improve interactions.

However, there is also a great potential in these projects, especially, now that they are still very young. Common rule of investment in this space is to go where the money is. gts:
The quality of customer service you provide affects the customer experience and ultimately your brand. Poor customer service can lead the customers to believe that the brand is lazy and doesn‚Äôt care about them. So how exactly can you improve your customer experience? That‚Äôs where CRM comes into play.

CRM provides a technological foundation for great customer service

Here are a few ways you can get your salespeople to fall in love with CRM

Real time data sharing across teams

When customers have to repeat their problems to every support person, they can get annoyed and give up on your product. CRM systems eliminate this problem by giving customer data and history access to the entire team no matter which platform the customer came from, making the customer service process seamless and efficient.

Knowledge Management

CRM systems provide knowledge management portals that enable customer self-service. Customers can access the FAQ and troubleshooting articles and solve basic problems without needing to talk to a representative. CRM systems also help set up online forums where customers can interact with each other and ask questions. Convenient, isn‚Äôt it?

Consistent Customer Experience

Getting feedback from customers is also a form of customer service, one where you show them you care about their experience!

CRM allows you to automate surveys and schedule follow ups to gather customer feedback about how you can improve your service for them.

With Databeys sales CRM, you can provide attentive customer support and increase your response time, hence improving your relationship with your customers and increasing customer satisfaction rate.

gts:
Ocean Orb lights suspended above the square outside Whites Tavern in Belfast. Photo via Ultimaker.

Creative design studio Urban Scale Interventions (USI) has created an immersive lighting piece and soundscape in Belfast‚Äôs historic ‚ÄòEntries‚Äô using 3D printing and recycled filament.

Made up of 43 suspended ‚Äòocean orbs‚Äô, the lighting piece is the result of a contract won by USI in 2020 to reimagine the city‚Äôs central vision to lighting. The orbs were created using Ultimaker S5 3D printers and recycled PETG filament from Filamentive, and were designed to improve safety in the area and reflect the historic significance of the site.

Lighting up Belfast‚Äôs ‚ÄòEntries‚Äô

Steeped in history, the ‚ÄòEntries‚Äô in Belfast are a series of narrow alleyways that connect many of the main city center streets and districts. The Entries are still used today as cut-throughs and gathering spaces for outdoor dining by bars and restaurants, although over the years they have experienced antisocial issues and irregular lighting.

Segment of the 3D printed Ocean Orbs printed on an Ultimaker S5. Photo via Ultimaker.

USI turned to 3D printing to bring their immersive lighting installation to life due to the increased flexibility allowed by the technology to design the bespoke orbs and test prototypes. The team leveraged the capabilities of Ultimaker‚Äôs S5 3D printer to manufacture their orbs at scale in-house at a reduced cost than they could have hoped using alternative methods.

USI also took advantage of Ultimaker‚Äôs Material Alliance Program, which allows filament companies to offer their products and print profiles in the Ultimaker Marketplace, in order to gain greater material efficiency. The firm wanted to produce the orbs from a translucent recycled material in order to make a design statement regarding the potential of more sustainable and recycled materials within the built environment.

Source: 3D printing industry

gts:
The global oral OTC analgesics market is projected to expand at a CAGR of 4.61% during the forecast period, 2019‚Äì2028. The growth of the market is attributed to the increasing demand for topical analgesics.

Analgesics are the counter pain drugs which support in regulating a pain until and unless it is completely eliminated. OTC analgesic drugs are used by people without any need of prescription. Analgesics which do not require doctor‚Äôs prescription are classified as OTC analgesics. OTC analgesics are available in brand and generic preparations as tablets, capsules, creams, sprays, and patches. These OTC analgesics constitute three active ingredients namely paracetamol, ibuprofen, and aspirin.

Paracetamol is a most commonly used OTC analgesic. Its analgesic property is similar to that of aspirin and ibuprofen. It does not carry any anti-inflammatory effects. Paracetamol prevents prostaglandin synthesis within the central nervous system. It is the first choice of analgesic for pain management. Common side-effects associated with paracetamol are hypersensitivity, rare cases of blood dyscrasias (including thrombocytopenia and agranulocytosis). Aspirin is another common OTC analgesic. It is analgesic, antipyretic, antiplatelet, and anti-inflammatory. The inhibition of cyclooxygenase results in analgesic effect of aspirin. Incompatible effects of aspirin are epigastric pain, gastrointestinal ulceration, nausea and vomiting, hypersensitivity, and gout.

Market Drivers

Increasing demand of topical analgesics, which are available as pain-relieving creams, lotions, rubs, gels, and sprays, has increased the sales of analgesics by 18 percent. According to Kline Non-prescription Drugs US report, increasing geriatric population worldwide, will generate the demand for pain relief products. According to the US Census Bureau, between 2012 and 2050, the United States will experience considerable growth in its older population. Thus, the growth in geriatric population is driving the growth of the global OTC analgesics market.

Additionally, the cost efficiency of OTC analgesics drugs is also responsible for fuelling the growth of the market.

Visit https://insights10.com/ for more healthcare industry insights.

gts:
Are worries about debt weighing you down? Use this checklist to help you curb your expenses and get in better financial health.

Cut up your credit cards. If you want to keep one, leave it at home.

2. Organize your financial records. Figure out how much you owe and to whom.

3. Track what you spend this month, looking for unnecessary expenses you can cut next month.

4. Pay bills on time to avoid late charges.

5. Pay credit card balances in full if you can. Next best thing: Make more than the minimum payment.

6. Target debts that have the highest interest rates and fees. Pay them off first.

7. If you want to get paid more, ask for a raise, offer extra hours at work, or find another job. If you‚Äôre making some extra cash from side hustles, use it to pay off.

8. If you want to get rid of things you no longer use, hold a yard sale or sell them online. Whatever you earn from selling your products use for anything else but paying bills.

9. Set up an emergency fund. Instead of using a credit card for an unexpected expense, use cash.

10. Create a barter system. Switching things up by swapping items and services with friends or neighbors could help save some cash.

11. When looking for cheap entertainment, look for free events such as park days, movie nights at local libraries, and picnic lunches.

12. Discuss things with your family. Make sure everyone buys into your debt reduction plan.

13. Get in touch with your creditors. If you‚Äôre having trouble paying for something, ask if there‚Äôs any way.

14. If you‚Äôre carrying multiple high-interest credit cards, consolidate them into one low-interest card.

15. Look ahead at where you want to be in the next year! Now paying off bills may not be fun, but it will eventually lead to improved financial health and allow you to reach your goals.

Need any help contact debt relief companies

gts:
Life is result of choices.

‚ÄúTo do or not to do‚Äù, this is what defines you and your life.

In our life, we always get choices and what we do is decide.

And this decision is what defines us.

These choices we get in life, lead our path.

There is nothing called luck.

If someone makes the right choice, usually people call them lucky. If the same person had made the wrong choice, they would have become unlucky. Strange isn‚Äôt it.

There is also nothing called life‚Äôs plan.

Its our choices which lay out the plan.

Our life depends only and only on one thing, and that is capability to decide. Our life is no different than a flow chart.

In fact our life is like a flow chart.

And this flow chart has number of decision points, and these are the chances we get to change our life.

Often we are these decision point on flow chart.

The choice is to either continue what we are doing the rest of our lives or to start something new, like a new job, move to a new place or take up new challenge.

Some of us who have

- Guts to change their life

- Take up new challenges

- Face new odds

They usually take up the chance to change their life.

Others just find some excuse (there can be thousands of them) and continue with their life. Both these people are right, as its their life, which is changing for good or worse as per the decision they take.

gts:
Dear Uber and OLA Execs in the wild, your drivers are cancelling rides and taking money offline. Please read to know why. Vijay Balasubramanian Dec 13, 2021¬∑2 min read

I am sure every blogging and social media platform on the web has spoken about this. So it is about time, the actual folks noticed what is going wrong with your Apps.

Photo by Viktor Avdeev on Unsplash

OLA and Uber taxi drivers in India are taking orders, then speaking to clients and then cancelling rides. Once the rides are cancelled, they are dropping clients at their respective destinations and taking money offline. Why you wonder?

The simple answer is high commissions from Ola and Uber. Previously it was bad drivers looking to make high numbers with each ride. Right now its only Ola/Uber who‚Äôs fueling this problem.

I‚Äôve heard it from all drivers I took in the last 3 months. Most of them requested I cancel and pay them directly. While I refused one, I couldn‚Äôt refuse the 2 more due to urgency. But its a telling sign of things if all drivers can feel the pinch.

Funnily enough Ola even has an option to report this saying ‚ÄòDriver asked me to cancel the ride and pay offline‚Äô. Which shows that Ola is more than aware of this issue. I am not willing to believe that they don‚Äôt know why this happens.

Drivers are not angels, I get that. But they do not have to constantly do this if Ola charges them reasonably. A lot of drivers are decent folks looking to make a living. So the ball is right now in OLA/Uber ‚Äòs court. They can solve this permanently if they take reasonable commissions or offer other perks or transfer some of these costs to their customer as subscription fees or something. If they take care of drivers and drivers wont take shortcuts like these.

Till then these ride sharing services are fighting a losing battle. Drivers will constantly find way to circumvent their tech. The app is literally built for the driver, so monitoring the driver‚Äôs every action would be next to impossible. Customers can only help them report mishaps to some degree. My last driver even told me that.

Image Courtesy : Google Image

We are breathing in the modern age, this era of technology. Every day new technologies are being introduced in the world. Of course, this technology has made human life easier.

Just as technology is innovating on a daily basis, so is fashion. Just as the gadget has become a status symbol for some segments, so too have clothing brands become a means of asserting their status.

Brands are the easiest way to showcase your status to the eating and drinking class of society. Every material thing comes in the circle of this brand, such as mobile, car, household goods, clothes, etc.

The craze for branded clothes is now slowly creeping into the middle class as well. The bottom line is that there is no abomination in wearing beautiful clothes or good quality clothes, there is no abomination in wearing good branded clothes but covering up the process. It is not appropriate to make a splash.

There is no prohibition on dressing well in religion or in society. Anyway, good and beautiful clothes have a profound effect on a person‚Äôs personality and brighten the personality.

There are many people in our society who want their appearance and lifestyle to be appreciated. Because they do not have any qualities that make their personality valuable. That‚Äôs why they try to hide their short stature in brands.

Some people belonging to the elite class regularly say that we have worn this brand and bought so much. Whether it is a celebration of happiness or sorrow, brands are always mentioned. It is not seen who is in front, the only purpose is to show the brand.

I‚Äôm not condemning people who wear brands. The problem arises when these ‚Äúrich‚Äù people make others feel superior because they are not wearing expensive brands.

My only message to these people is that if you are well dressed, carrying a good bag, having a good phone, please do not pretend to offend anyone. If there is no status then that feeling of inferiority will be captured.

Remember that brands do not define your personality. It is your character and your character that define your personality.

Hey there¬≠¬≠ you‚Äî Here is a secret. Get excited!

Look. You can live longer, stronger, happier, and more creatively. Right now. Instantly. Guaranteed.

Listen. No one is the same. Your truth is your passion. But finding the right fit can be a lonely dance.

Try It Now

Start by becoming more optimistic. Researchers found optimism had a remarkable impact on physical health. Heart disease, immunity, cancer, pregnancy outcomes, pain tolerance.

People with more optimistic outlooks had better results and did better in the long run than pessimistic people. Having a positive attitude boosts physical health, no matter the problem.

Optimism is timeless and global. Nelson Mandela called it heading for the sun one step at a time. Let it burn your eyes. Sometimes you will fail. You are the future, bright and powerful.

Benjamin Franklin explains it like this. We can‚Äôt control all that happens to us, but we can control what happens inside us. In the future you will fail much better.

So be a bulldog. Like Winston Churchill. Because it does not seem to be much use to be anything else.

You will grow stronger. Here is a haiku gift to get started. These describe things I found extraordinary in the mundane, sand, boats, dogs, cats, sheets, love, laundry. They can be useful for wrapping your head around things, or opening your mind.

Finally, we need each other to come together to make things grow. Here‚Äôs how you can help.

Follow me on this site so I can do more to spread the word, and most important‚Ä¶

Whenever you see something exciting, authentic, beautiful, imaginative, or filled with adventure, tag it #RomanticLife.

Look around life and enjoy. Thanks!

We offer complete transport solutions, whether it is a Complete (FTL) or Groupage (LTL) transport from Turkey to over the Europe, to the Balkan countries, Middle East and Turkish Republics, and vice versa.

Located near the Frankfurt ‚Äî Airport we are able to offer Mini Van and Panel Van transport to all of Germany and Europe, as well as Express transport services available 24/7, 365 days a year.

In our fleet we have Semi-trailers, Frigo-trailers, Tilt Truck, Panel Van and Mini Van. We also have a Semi ‚Äî trailers with various upgrades, Truck-Trailers ( Tandem Truck ), and Panel Van available for 5, 6 and 7 paletes to meet the specific requirements of our customers.

Thanks to a years long experience of our expert staff willing to give trouble-free services to our clients, Maxi Logistics Services has become a regional leader in the transport sector. Permanent quality control of our services, unique to the whole company, helps us to surpass our customer expectations.

To start advertising on Facebook and Instagram, follow these key steps:

1. **Create a Business Manager Account**: This is the first step to manage your advertising campaigns. You can create a Business Manager account through the Facebook Business Manager platform.

2. **Set Up Your Ad Account**: Once your Business Manager account is set up, you can create an ad account. This account will be used to manage your advertising campaigns.

3. **Choose Your Payment Currency**: You can choose between Dollar (USD) and Naira (NGN) as your payment currency. This is important to ensure that your ad budget is managed correctly.

4. **Understand Your Audience**: Identify your target audience based on demographics, interests, and behaviors. This will help you create more effective ads.

5. **Create Your Ad Campaign**: Design your ad creative, set your budget, and define your campaign goals. You can use Facebook's Ads Manager to create and manage your campaigns.

6. **Monitor and Optimize**: Keep an eye on your ad performance and make adjustments as needed. Use Facebook's analytics tools to track your campaign's success.

7. **Personal Experience**: I recommend creating your Business Manager account first, as it provides a centralized platform for managing all your advertising activities.

Feel free to share your personal experience and any tips you have for others starting their advertising journey on Meta platforms.
</response>

On-page and off-page SEO are crucial for improving your website's visibility in search engine results. Here are the key elements you should focus on:

1. **Keywords:** Use targeted keywords naturally throughout your content, including in titles, headings, and body text.
2. **Meta Tags:** Ensure your meta titles and descriptions are compelling and include your target keywords.
3. **Backlinks:** Acquire high-quality backlinks from reputable websites to improve your domain authority.
4. **Organic vs. Paid Ads:** Organic search results are free and organic, while paid ads (PPC) are paid for by advertisers. Organic results are more trustworthy and have a higher click-through rate.

This should keep your article focused and effective. Let me know if you need any specific examples or further details!

gts:
SEO Stands for Search Engine Optimization. Search engine optimization is the method involved with finding a way ways to help a site or piece of content position higher on Google.

Search Engine Optimization(SEO)

The vital contrast among SEO and paid publicizing is that SEO includes ‚Äúorganic‚Äù positioning(Organic Search Engine Optimization), which implies you don‚Äôt pay to be in that space. To make it somewhat less complex, website streamlining implies taking a piece of online content and upgrading it so web indexes like Google show it towards the highest point of the page when somebody looks for something.

Take a gander at it thusly. At the point when somebody types ‚Äúveggie lover lasagna‚Äù into Google, they‚Äôre probably searching for a formula, fixings, and directions on the best way to make it. If you composed an article about making vegetarian lasagna, you‚Äôd need individuals to track down your formula. For anybody to track down it, you want to rank over the wide range of various sites with plans for vegetarian lasagna. It‚Äôs difficult, at that point you may have to hire Search Engine Optimization Specialist and that is the thing that SEO is about.

Core Elements of SEO: On-Page SEO and Off-Page SEO

Today‚Äôs businesses are living in a time when the state of their technology infrastructure defines their market success. At this day, no company can manage its work flow without relying on technology. Small and medium businesses, on the other hand, face an even bigger struggle in managing their IT resources. Cloud hosting has emerged as the final answer to the majority of technology difficulties that businesses and organizations face.

WHAT IS CLOUD HOSTING AND HOW DOES IT WORK?

In cloud computing or cloud hosting, the word ‚Äòcloud‚Äô is a metaphor for the internet. So, in a nutshell, it refers to a variety of IT-related services such as storage, networking, database, and software that are virtually given to businesses and organizations through the internet by various cloud hosting providers. This allows organizations to manage their work from anywhere and at any time without having to invest a lot of money on IT infrastructure such as server and network settings.

Cloud Hosting Comes in a Variety of Forms

The way public and private enterprises interact with IT services has changed dramatically as a result of cloud hosting technologies. These businesses only have to pay for the cloud services they utilize, which helps them save money and better manage their infrastructure. Today, we have a variety of cloud computing services to meet practically any IT need. Among these, these are the most important services.

Manage your business with unlimited cloud hosting

JachOOs is a renowned cloud hosting service with strong ties to well-known datacenters throughout the world. At low pricing, we provide limitless cloud hosting plans on very capable servers from Google Cloud, Microsoft Azure, AWS, DigitalOcean, and Linode. If you‚Äôre still using traditional web hosting to operate your business, it‚Äôs time to upgrade to limitless cloud hosting with sophisticated features like cPanel, Softaculous, DDoS Protection, SSL Certificates, and more.

JachOOs is one of the best website hosting services in the UAE, based on Amazon Web Services, Digital Ocean, Google Cloud Hosting, and Microsoft Azure‚Äôs main cloud infrastructure providers. You can fully utilize these cloud services‚Äô powerful cloud server since they have invested billions of dollars in their networks and technologies. Our hosting is utilized as a deployment layer with Terra-form, allowing us to be independent of a single cloud provider. All of our cloud services and virtual dedicated servers are set up in an automatic and consistent manner.

gts:
3 innovation and digital news in 1 minute. Every Monday. Episode 275

News 1. Pizza but made by a robot

Pazzi is an autonomous pizzeria in Paris with another location in Serris in the East of Paris. They call themselves the world‚Äôs first autonomous restaurant. Customers order on a self order terminal which allows them to customise the exact toppings of the pizza. The robot arms then prepare the dough, add the sauce and toppings, put the pizza in the oven and cut it in front of your eyes. If you also ordered a drink you‚Äôll get that from a vending machine. Opinion: Pazzi is an excitable example of how a human task can be automated. There is a large team behind it, so we expect to see more of these restaurants in the near future.

A not even that simple task is automated by a robot arm, fun to watch Pazzi make Pizza!

News 2.Click & Collect but cool

Delipop launched a pick up location for groceries in cooperation with Carrefour in October. To use its service, customers have to order groceries in Carrefour Drive and set the Delipop store as the pick up location. Customers can pick up their orders the same day if ordered in the morning or next day if ordered later during the day. Customers get an access code to enter the colourful Delipop pick-up store. Opinion: Delipop aggregates orders and thus operates at significant lower cost compared to ultra-fast deliveries. At the same time the fresh and modern designed pick-up stores can keep up with the coolness-factor of Gorillas.

A hip and cool pick-up store for groceries, we hope to see more of these around Europe‚Äôs neighbourhoods.

News 3. ‚ÄúAlmost Just Walk Out‚Äù but more practical

Carrefour launched their new, first of its kind, autonomous store ‚ÄúCarrefour Flash 10/10‚Äù in Paris at the end of November. Utilising cameras and scales the store tracks the products taken and customers just have to pay ‚Äî no scanning needed. Opinion: Compared to ‚ÄúJust Walk Out‚Äù technology, customers still have to pay manually. However they don‚Äôt need to download an app and register before before shopping. This makes this store more practical to use for a larger audience.

Convenient, no download of an app required.

Projects that go live on GameFi Launchpad can receive support from Element promotion.

600 X-Metaverse Mystery Boxes, the third Element GameFi Launchpad project, are about to go live at 1 PM (UTC) tomorrow.

Time: 13:00(UTC),Dec.29th

AmountÔºö600

PriceÔºö80 BUSD

There are 600 Tesseract Mystery Boxes, containing 360 Battleship N, 144 Battleship R, 60 Battleship S, 30 Battleship SR, 6 Battleship SSR.

Incentive: IDO whitelist for X-Metaverse holders

Description: X-Metaverse is a Star Wars game based on the NFT and blockchain for exploring, mining, trading and battling, allowing players to collect, mine, breed, battle, and trade token-based astronauts and battleships. It has astronauts and different types of battleships, each with multiple skills.

Players need to configure a minimum of three ships and a navigator to play, with a maximum of three navigators and three ships. Each ship comes with four skills, each with attack value, shield value, and the amount of energy required and may have specific skill effects, and the higher the rarity of the ship, the additional base attributes of the ship. Each navigator also has a skill that provides an extra skill for the ship they are on.

X-Metaverse will gradually open up PVP battles, planet lands, planet alliances, planet exploration, ship racing, mining towns, technology development, planet visits and more in subsequent updates.

Following last week‚Äôs announcement, we want to give you an insight on the Collector Score we are working on. This feature is designed to make the collecting on Starly even more exciting, adding an element of treasure hunt ‚Äî rewarding the most persistent collectors.

Your Collector Score will be the sum of all the cards you own, buying and selling cards having an immediate impact on it.

Every card will have a score based on the rarity class and serial number, price category also having a smaller significance impact on the final score. The scores for customized collections will be calculated on a per case basis, following the same pattern.

Card score overview

For example, if you own a Rare card with serial number 7, your card score is 102. This number then will be multiplied by the price category coefficient that is 0.7‚Äì1.4 for the sales prices we have had so far.

There will be ongoing perks and benefits for higher ranking Collectors. Amongst other things, they will include an access to exclusive drops, occasional airdrops in form of packs and $STARLY tokens, as well as an active involvement in the decision making process ‚Äî forming Starly DAO ‚Äî voting for —Åollections to be launched and featured, new features, and a lot more.

Collector Scores will also serve as the basis to calculate the $STARLY tokens airdrop to our Community ‚Äî you might want to hold on to your best ranked cards ‚Äî your lowest serials is gold! We will provide more details shortly.

This is still a work in progress and your opinion matters, so feel free to share with us your thoughts or suggestions on our social media!

Twitter / Discord / Telegram Chat

gts:
More and more entrepreneurs and remote workers are choosing to join coworking spaces. Beginning your business from home is a cost-effective option, but it can lack the professionalism and growth your business may eventually require.

There are numerous benefits to joining a coworking community:

Be Part of a Community

Work with like-minded individuals who will encourage you to grow. Even if you work from home, it‚Äôs a great way to connect to business owners, leaders, freelancers, start-ups, and entrepreneurs. Find networking opportunities and inspiration from relationships you will build.

Working alone doesn‚Äôt mean you have to be lonely!

Flexibility & Convenience

Work and set your own schedule with a variety of options to fit your needs. Need a conference room once a month? Book it! Need more desks for added team members? Expand to a bigger office space! Are you a parent who needs a quiet space away from kids? Coworking can give you the break you need to get work done!

You can easily book space for a day or a month at a time. Coworking is a hybrid work model which allows you the flexibility you need to run your business.

Invaluable Tools & Resources

Coworking allows you the opportunity to grow by providing resources you may not otherwise have available to you including:

Cost Savings

Coworking will save you money by minimizing your overhead costs. You will only pay for the space you need, not the managed facilities. This can be a huge savings for your business compared to renting a leased office.

When using a coworking office, you don‚Äôt have to worry about chairs, desks, maintenance costs, or decorating the space. You won‚Äôt need to purchase furniture. Outfitting a new office can be very expensive as well as take time and effort.

Professional Workspace

Make a good impression when meeting with potential clients, interviewing, training, hosting webinars, events, and more. At Burbity Workspaces we give you an amazing location which sets you up for success.

Embrace the coworking model today for your business and thrive!

Ready to Join the Burbity Coworking Community?

JOIN TODAY!

We‚Äôve made a number of changes to the Dexfolio app this week.

There‚Äôs a new update system in place to ensure that our public releases are stable. Updates are now first pushed out to testers to give us the opportunity to identify and resolve any issues prior to the update going live.

To become a tester and test the latest features before everybody else, you can click the links below:

Here‚Äôs what‚Äôs in this weeks open testing update

Improvements

Updated the token details page so that scrolling still works if you drag your finger over the graph area.

Better handling of backend timeout errors.

App optimization to reduce the delay on tap.

Security enhancements.

Bug Fixes

Fixed a bug that caused the user to have an empty portfolio when rebooting the app after an error occurred adding their wallet.

Fixed an issue in which a formatting error was preventing certain tokens from being added to users portfolios.

Fixed a bug that allowed for the ‚Äòterms of policy‚Äô box to be unticked.

Diabetes is a chronic disease that happens when the pancreas fails to produce enough insulin or when the body‚Äôs insulin is ineffectively used.

Insulin is a hormone that helps to keep blood sugar levels in check.

Uncontrolled diabetes causes hyperglycemia, or high blood sugar, which causes catastrophic damage to many of the body‚Äôs systems, including the neurons and blood vessels, over time.

What are the many kinds of diabetes?

Type 1, type 2, and gestational diabetes are the most frequent kinds of diabetes.

Type 1 diabetes

Your body does not produce insulin if you have type 1 diabetes.

Your immune system targets and destroys the insulin-producing cells in your pancreas.

Diabetes type 1 is most commonly diagnosed in children and young adults, but it can strike anyone at any age.

To stay alive, people with type 1 diabetes must take insulin every day.

Symptoms

The following are some of the signs and symptoms of type 1 diabetes:

Frequent urination

Thirst

Excessive hunger

Weight loss

Fuzzy vision

Exhaustion

It could also cause mood changes

Type 2 diabetes

Your body does not generate or utilise insulin well if you have type 2 diabetes.

Type 2 diabetes can strike at any age, including youth.

This type of diabetes, on the other hand, is more common in middle-aged and older adults.

Type 2 diabetes is the most frequent type.

Symptoms

The following are some of the signs and symptoms of type 2 diabetes:

Excessive urination

Tiredness

Hunger has grown.

Thirst has grown

Unclear eyesight

Sores that take a long time to heal

Gestational diabetes

During pregnancy, some women acquire gestational diabetes.

This type of diabetes usually goes away once the baby is born.

If you‚Äôve experienced gestational diabetes, though, you‚Äôre more likely to develop type 2 diabetes later in life.

It‚Äôs possible that diabetes diagnosed during pregnancy is actually type 2.

Diabetes in other forms

Monogenic diabetes, which is an inherited form of diabetes, is a less prevalent variety, and cystic fibrosis-related diabetes.

gts:
Vegan and packed with protein. A seriously crunchy salad loaded with antioxidants and superfoods. This salad surely won‚Äôt leave you hungry.

This delicious recipe can be enjoyed as a side salad or full on meal. It‚Äôs loaded with filling plant based protein and anti-inflammatory omega fatty acids.

Superfoods are a select group of complete foods that are known to be exceptional high in nutrients and yield many health benefits to those who consume them.

Let‚Äôs take a look at the ingredients and their health benefits.

Pumpkin Seeds. These seeds are bursting with flavor and protein. They are also rich in many minerals such as magnesium and zinc. Health benefits of these compounds include general heart and bone health as well as regulating blood sugar levels.

Chia Seeds. Chia seeds are known for their antioxidant properties, are a great addition to anyone‚Äôs diet. Antioxidants contain free radicals that scavenge throughout the human body eating damaged cells and allowing new ones to flourish. Additionally the seeds are high in protein and fiber, which curbs your appetite and promotes gut health.

Flax Seeds. These seeds are rich in omega-3 fats, leading it to be one of the best inflammation fighting foods. Linked to better heart and brain health, these fatty acids are loaded in just a spoonful of flax seeds.

Ingredients

1 1/2 cups Lettuce (I used bibb lettuce but your favorite lettuce mix will work)

1/2 cup shredded carrots

1/4 cup pickled purple cabbage (can substitute fresh cabbage as well)

2 tablespoons pumpkin seeds

1 teaspoon chia seeds

1 teaspoon flax seeds

Vinaigrette dressing

Directions

Begin layering all ingredients in a bowl. Combine in the following order; lettuce, carrots, cabbage, pumpkin seeds, chia seeds, flax seeds. This order is important, as the bulkier food items should be on the bottom and smaller ones added after. Then top the layers with your favorite vinaigrette!

Enjoy the crunch!

BCCI boss Sourav Ganguly had conducted the test of Kovid 19 on Monday, the report of which was received late on Monday evening and that report was positive.

It is worth noting that about a year ago, BCCI President Sourav Ganguly‚Äôs brother Snehasish was found infected with Corona. During that time Ganguly‚Äôs corona report came negative, but this time Ganguly‚Äôs corona report has come positive. According to media reports, Sourav Ganguly has been admitted to Woodlands Hospital in Kolkata. Ganguly has been staying at his Kolkata home for a long time.

Has been the captain of the team for a long time.

Sourav Ganguly, who played international cricket for India for about 12 years, has also been the captain of Team India for a long time. Under his leadership, Team India performed well on foreign soil. Even under his captaincy, Team India played the final match of the 2003 World Cup, in which Team India had to face defeat at the hands of Australia. He has won many bilateral and multi-nation series for the country.

Sourav Ganguly, who made his international debut in the year 1996, played the last international match in the year 2008. After this, he definitely appeared in the IPL till the year 2012, but he had retired from international cricket. Not only this, he also appeared in cricket as an administrator and coach after retiring from competitive cricket. He has also served as the President of the Cricket Association of Bengal for a long time.

1. Moringa Actives

Buy Now.

Moringa Actives is a modern food supplement that supports weight loss. The product was designed for people who want to maintain a healthy body weight, reduce the feeling of hunger and support the metabolism.

The main component of the Moringa Actives food supplement is an extract from the leaves of moringa oleoderma, which acts on many levels, supporting the weight loss process. The plant reduces the accumulation of fat tissue, helps maintain normal blood sugar levels, lowers cholesterol levels and supports detoxification of the body.

Moringa Actives capsules also contain black pepper fruit extract, Malabar tamarind extract and chromium. These ingredients help to maintain a healthy body weight

2. NuviaLab Keto

Buy Now

NuviaLab Keto is a multi-ingredient food supplement that supports weight control while on the ketogenic diet. It is dedicated to people who want to lose weight while following a high-fat diet.

NuviaLab Keto supports weight loss, adds energy, supports fat metabolism and provides support during the so-called "keto flu". In addition, the product improves digestion and helps stabilize blood sugar levels. NuviaLab Keto is the perfect solution for people who want to achieve ketosis.

3. Nutrigo Lab Burner

Buy Now

Nutrigo Lab Burner is a food supplement addressed to persons who want to lose weight and shape their figure. The product contains 6 ingredients, which are considered to be natural fat tissue reducers. The Nutrigo Lab Burner food supplement is especially recommended for athletes who want to quickly lose excess kilograms and expose their muscles.

Nutrigo Lab Burner helps to reduce body fat and prevents its storage. Regular use of the capsules helps reduce the appetite and maintain normal blood glucose levels. The effectiveness of the supplement is primarily influenced by the SINETROL¬Æ Xpur component, which increases the rate of release of fatty acids and glycerol.

It is worth noting that the formula of the supplement was created based exclusively on natural plant extracts and minerals. As a result, the product is safe for the body.

gts:
UnicusOne NFT Marketplace Goes for Beta Launch with Smart Contract Audit

Next-gen NFT marketplace Unicus has launched its beta version along with smart contract audit for public testing. The objective of beta testing is to identify security risks by testing the functionality of the smart contract. This will help evaluate the quality of the coding and its efficiency.

Smart contract audits are the first line of defence to safeguard investors‚Äô funds. Quillhash, a leading blockchain code auditing firm, has checked the smart contract code for Unicus.

Launching a product in beta is knowingly releasing it with possible bugs to users. This enables an enterprise to observe how a product is performing when stretched. A beta launch has been a great way to identify the bugs and thereafter work to resolve them. A sub-par performance of a code during the beta phase helps smooth out the friction before the final version is released.

In blockchain-based products, beta launch generally comes after a smart contract audit that helps companies avoid potentially catastrophic vulnerabilities. An audit comprises automatic scans as well as expert reviews. Automatic scans via APIs and manual checking of code gives users peace of mind as they know the code is fortified.

Unicus is a one-of-a-kind marketplace for NFTs, resolving the existing pain-points in the ecosystem such as unauthorized NFTs, lack of value transfer across blockchain, and absence of loans against NFTs among others. On Unicus, traders find a cross-chain marketplace that is simple to work on and secure.

As a one-stop platform facilitating a full range of trading activities, Unicus enables traders play NFTs at their full potential. It has effectively plugged the gaps in the existing NFT marketplace ecosystem. The platform also offers advanced statistical and historical capabilities.

Unicus enables content creators to mint NFTs, add metadata and necessary code to the tokens to attain objectives such as continual payment of royalty to the original creator. Adding metadata is as simple as filling a form.

Native token of the marketplace is U1 with the total supply of 250 million tokens. It is deployed on the Binance Smart Chain followed by Polygon (Matic).

By June 2022, Unicus plans to launch NFTs for business assets as well.

gts:
Working for a living is my lifestyle.

This is the mantra of the 21st Century phenomenon known as the hustle culture. Instead of working to make a living, hustle culture demands people work as a lifestyle. Although kicked off by the advent of the celebrity entrepreneur, it wasn‚Äôt soon until the average citizen made the decision that working for a living was, indeed, their actual lifestyle.

Elon Musk, the founder of Tesla, famously tweeted that ‚Äúnobody ever changed the world in 40 hours a week‚Äù, suggesting that people would need to work twice as hard in order to reach the upper echelons of success.

This new breed of entrepreneurs has seemingly enhanced the work ethic usually associated with the gig worker. The thing that separates ‚Äòhustle culture‚Äô from ordinary hard work and long hours can be summed up in one word: passion. Entrepreneurs, gig workers, small business owners, and others make their living by doing what they love every day. This is what keeps people motivated to work in the wee hours of the night or to sacrifice their weekends or other off days. Owning your own business comes with certain responsibilities that may seem like more work to some, but won‚Äôt feel the same if you‚Äôre the owner.

Small business owners know that their jobs don‚Äôt end once the clock hits 5 o‚Äôclock. If you aren‚Äôt running business operations into the evenings, you‚Äôre thinking about new ways to improve your sales, talking to potential customers and vendors, or looking for ways to cut costs and increase revenue. Regardless of your situation as a business owner, one way to help establish a healthy work ethic is to keep your finances organized and in check. Here is where financial management services can help you achieve your success story.

Especially for the gig worker, dealing with multiple sources of income is the norm. The same is true about accounts payable, as there is a strong possibility of having various vendors that need to be paid for their services as well. Hustle culture might find you dealing with many vendors and clients over time, so having a centralized platform for financial management can help save time and stress. Services like Chime.com, Bill.com or Metaprise ‚Äî Commerce Bank, to name a few, can help to handle your business finances and, conversely, take some of the stress off your role as an Owner. It‚Äôs worth checking out one of these time-saving services and thus provide yourself time to put a little life back into your hustle.

gts:
Information about the building, such as its size, the number of rooms in the building, and the number of occupants the building can accommodate (for those Lootizens planning to rent out their building) will also be available.

Once buildings are purchased, they can either be kept by the building owner or tagged to the owner‚Äôs plot. To tag a building onto your land, you would first need to view the measurements of the building in terms of Agrums (each Agrum is equivalent to a square foot in Lootverse) and then pay LTTs to have the Loot NFT team measure your plot of land to determine if the building would fit on your plot. For example, if your plot measures 200 Agrums, you can not tag a building that measures more than this amount. However, multiple buildings can be tagged onto your plot as long as they fit).

Once you tag a building onto your plot, you can not sell that plot without the building. Lootizens looking to demolish or improve their buildings will need to pay per Agrum to do so with LTT. Tagging buildings to your plot of land could improve the value of the plot like in the real world.

Also, the God Matrix may impact your plot with natural disasters. With buildings on your plot and LTTs at stake, you may need to acquire insurance from an in-world insurance business to protect your property from the effects of the God Matrix.

Is video a component of your marketing plan? If it isn‚Äôt, it must be! Why? Consumers have grown accustomed to being advertised to through videos, and many increasingly demand it from brands they recognize and trust.



It took me a long time to get used to video, especially the ones that required me to be in front of the camera! However, there are many different ways to make videos, so if you‚Äôre afraid of being in front of the camera, don‚Äôt worry; you don‚Äôt have to be a video star to get started.



The truth is that having a well-written product description, a snappy sponsored ad, or a beautiful landing page is no longer enough to appeal to a large portion of your target audience. According to a Wyzowl survey, 8% of respondents claimed that watching a brand‚Äôs video influenced them to buy a product or service.



Perhaps you‚Äôre nodding your head in agreement that video marketing is a priority for you. That‚Äôs fantastic! But do you have a strategy in place based on your ideal consumer profile, or are you just slamming stuff out there in the hopes that something sticks?

Video Marketing Benefits

Here are a few video marketing benefits to persuade you that a well-thought-out strategy is worthwhile:



You can spread the word about your product or service.



- It‚Äôs a clever technique to engage/entertain your website/social media audience.



- It aids in the simple explanation of your goods or service to others.



- If you provide excellent recommendations and advice, you will increase customer retention.



- It‚Äôs time to take advantage of this crucial but frequently disregarded, marketing strategy.

Here are three stages to putting together a video marketing strategy that can boost engagement, leads, and sales.

Read more about Video Marketing

Photo by Sa≈°o Tu≈°ar on Unsplash

Every person has authority. ‚Äî Whether it is an authority over other people, or an authority that is expressed in self-control, and encouragement is the most beautiful form of authority.

Music can encourage motivation, as it inspires you associatively.

It brings you to connect with your own strong and authentic sides.

There is nothing more encouraging than realizing that you have unique sides that can be nurtured to a level of expertise ‚Äî that will bring remarkable results.

Music teaches us something about goals

Instead of aiming to make a sum of money that is usually represented by numbers, it is better that you aim to achieve the atmosphere of financial security, or financial abundance.

The reason for doing so, is that if you intend to achieve the atmosphere of wealth, your way will be in a more positive spirit.

Wealth can be represented by atmosphere as well.

When we say abundance, we are not really estimate it in numbers, but in association.

You will also be able to mobilize this knowledge for other life topics.

If you want a relationship, aim for the atmosphere you are looking for and not for a specific girl, and thus you will understand what kind of relationship you are looking for.

In addition, you will also understand a lot of things about yourself.

This is a more good and practical way, to aim for your own vision.

### Global Polycystic Kidney Disease Market Overview

Polycystic kidney disease (PKD) is a genetic disorder characterized by the formation of numerous fluid-filled cysts in the kidneys, leading to progressive kidney damage and dysfunction. The market for PKD is expected to grow significantly over the forecast period of 2019‚Äì2028, with a Compound Annual Growth Rate (CAGR) of approximately 4.3%.

The market is segmented into two primary types: Autosomal Dominant (ADPKD) and Autosomal Recessive (ARPKD). ADPKD is the most common form, accounting for about 90% of PKD cases. ARPKD, on the other hand, is a rare form that primarily affects infants and young children.

### Market Growth Trends

The global PKD market is driven by several key factors, including advancements in diagnostic technologies, increased awareness, and the development of new treatment options. The rise in the aging population and the increasing prevalence of genetic disorders are also contributing to the growth of the market.

### Key Drivers

1. **Advancements in Diagnostic Technologies**: The introduction of non-invasive imaging techniques such as magnetic resonance imaging (MRI) and computed tomography (CT) scans has improved the accuracy of PKD diagnosis. This, in turn, has led to an increase in the number of PKD cases being detected and treated.

2. **Increased Awareness**: Public health campaigns and educational programs have raised awareness about PKD, encouraging early diagnosis and treatment. This has resulted in a growing number of patients seeking medical care and treatment options.

3. **Development of New Treatment Options**: The development of new drugs and therapies, such as cyst inhibitors and gene therapies, has provided new treatment options for PKD patients. These treatments have shown promising results in slowing the progression of the disease and improving patient outcomes.

### Market Segmentation by Disease Type

The PKD market is segmented into two primary types: ADPKD and ARPKD. ADPKD is the most common form, accounting for about 90% of PKD cases. ARPKD, on the other hand, is a rare form that primarily affects infants and young children.

### Geographical Scope

The global PKD market is expected to grow significantly in key regions such as North America and Europe. The North American market is expected to grow at a CAGR of 4.5% during the forecast period, driven by the increasing prevalence of PKD and the rising demand for advanced diagnostic and treatment technologies. The European market is expected to grow at a CAGR of 4.0%, driven by the increasing awareness of PKD and the growing number of patients seeking medical care and treatment options.

### Data Sources

The insights provided in this article are based on the data from https://insights10.com/.

### Conclusion

The global PKD market is expected to grow significantly over the forecast period, driven by advancements in diagnostic technologies, increased awareness, and the development of new treatment options. The market is segmented into two primary types: ADPKD and ARPKD. The North American and European markets are expected to grow at a CAGR of 4.5% and 4.0%, respectively.

For more detailed information, please refer to the reference data from https://insights10.com/.

Japan is a country whose origins are deeply rooted in religious beliefs. Because of this, there are numerous temples and shrines to visit throughout each prefecture. Each of them have their own unique history and have created festivals to celebrate them. Here is a list of the festivals you must see and experience if you ever find yourself abroad in Nara Prefecture, Japan

Omizutori

Credit: Japan-guide.com

Omizutori, also known as the Fire Festival, is the oldest festival in Japan. Located at Todaiji Temple in Nara Prefecture, this festival has been running yearly for the past 1,250+ years. It‚Äôs held anywhere from March 1st to 14th to cleanse the people of their sins and to celebrate spring of the new year.

2. Wakakusa Yamayaki

Credit: ohmatsuri.com

It is believed that this festival started through a land dispute between Nara‚Äôs great temples, and that they burned the mountainside for peace. While the history of it is disputed, it doesn‚Äôt take away from the beauty of it all. Held on the 4th Saturday of each January, the Yamayaki festival includes several celebrations, including; the throwing competition of giant rice crackers, a breathtaking fireworks show and the burning of the side of Wakakusayama mountain.

3. Setsubun Mantoro

This astonishing festival held at Kasuga Taisha Shrine, also known as the festival of wishes, is held every February 3rd. During this festival, more than 3,000 stone and brass lanterns are lit to celebrate the transition of winter to spring. It is believed that if you have a dream or a wish that you eagerly want to come true, the shrine will help make it come true.

ANIFTY Inc. (Tokyo, Japan), the operator of ANIFTY, the first NFT marketplace for anime art, released version 2 on October 31, 2021. We are also pleased to announce that the total number of certified artists has exceeded 300.

Newly added features in Version 2 (V2)

In ANIFTY Marketplace V2, you will be able to sell your artworks immediately without paying Ethereum transaction fees (gas fee). ANIFTY is the first NFT marketplace in Japan to implement this technology on Layer 1 (Ethereum Mainnet). In addition, it will be possible to change the price and quantity of items even after they are listed (in such cases, the seller will have to pay for the gas).

ANIFTY Certified Artists

After the launch of the marketplace, ANIFTY welcomed a number of new certified artists. There are currently over 300 registered artists, including Tantanmen and Onigiriman, who are rapidly gaining popularity in the NFT community both in Japan and overseas, Haruki Minamura, who designed the Hololive Vtuber ‚ÄúNatsuiro Matsuri‚Äù ,and TAPIOCA, who illustrated the card game ‚ÄúBattle Spirits‚Äù.

We are looking for certified artists!

ANIFTY is looking for certified artists. If you are interested, please apply from the form below.

https://forms.gle/Ekv8jPANW4uzAtSK6

Number of Exhibits Surpasses 500

One month after the launch of Marketplace V2, the number of works on display at ANIFTY Marketplace has exceeded 500.

Auction function to be released in early 2022

We are pleased to announce that we will be releasing an auction function in early 2022. The auction function will allow collectors to bid on a limited number of NFT pieces to determine the price. Smart contract technology will enable selling and bidding for gas-free.

About ANIFTY

ANIFTY Inc. is a start-up company that was selected for the 5th and 6th CO.NECT University of Tokyo Blockchain Entrepreneurship Support Program, and was established with the support of the University of Tokyo Blockchain Innovation Endowed Chair.

Official website: https://anifty.jp/

Global oilfield chemicals market is expected to grow at a CAGR of 4.21% during the forecast period of 2019‚Äì2026 and attain a value of USD 158.4 million by 2026.

Get more information on this report: Request Sample Pages

Oilfield chemicals are components available in liquid forms, widely used in oil & gas drilling projects for amendments in oil & gas exploration field operations. Drilling and production facilities mainly utilizes these chemicals to improve productivity and efficiency of the process & petroleum refining as well as to attain optimum performance with effective oil recovery. Oilfield chemicals promotes the maintenance of smooth operating oilfield, resulting in reduction of expenses over setbacks and stoppage faced during drilling processes. Additionally, they obstruct the formation of the metal scales and diminish the water level into the oil well during exploration & drilling, which positively affects in increasing demand and applications of oilfield chemicals.

The global oilfield chemicals market is growing exponentially and predicted to experience rapid growth during the forecast period 2019‚Äì2026. The factors majorly driving the growth of oilfield chemicals at global scale include growing exploration and drilling practices for natural resources such as oil and gas, rise in crude oil production, and need to reduce the gap between supply and demand chain. According to OECD, the crude oil production across the world is 3.97 million during the financial year 2017.

Furthermore, increasing population has amplified the energy requirements and to cope with energy demands more oil & gas E&P activities have been under taken to suffice the residential as well as industrial energy demand. This aspect has been boosting the growth of oilfield chemicals market.

Additionally, shift in inclination towards exploring the unconventional hydrocarbon sources is likely to infiltrate the market growth. Various advantages such as corrosion resistance, demulsification & paraffin dispersants, and repair system for cementing failures offered by the product further increases the demand for the product and is expected to fuel the market growth over the projected period 2019‚Äì2026.

For more information on oilfield chemicals Market, please click here.

CircadiYin is a weight loss supplement that can help you burn fat from all the stubborn areas of your body in no time. It does this by restoring the circadian rhythm. The circadian rhythms are the internal clocks in our brain that work all day. Our mental, physical and behavioral changes follow this 24-hour cycle that regulates alertness and sleepiness by responding primarily to light and dark. This is why most living things sleep at night and are awake during the day

InPoker announces partnership with DareNFT, an NFT 2.0 protocol that brings innovation to the world of digital assets InPoker Nov 23, 2021¬∑2 min read

InPoker and DareNFT are pleased to announce they have entered into a strategic partnership to combine DareNFT‚Äôs innovative NFT ecosystem with InPoker ambitious e-sports vision.

DareNFT is an universal NFT 2.0 protocol for digital assets. DareNFT has developed a suite of products to address some of the challenges in the NFT landscape, including unrecognized benefits between NFTs, unrecognized relationships between NFT owners and hidden risks of NFT ownership. There are many content types out there and whereas the content types matter at application level, the licensing protocol layer is the same for all of them. Therefore, there is only one protocol needed to serve all.

The existing licencing processes of derivative content are mostly manual and time consuming. With an NFT 2.0 smart contract, these processes can be automated. Derivative content such as: song remixes, subtitled videos, edited images, learning contents, translated book often generates revenue from the rental and subscription business model. Creators can receive royalties from reproducer‚Äôs revenue via the NFT smart contract. This speeds up collaboration and sharing of benefits between the author and re-publisher, resulting in more income for both parties.

The advent of the NFT 2.0 protocol that DareNFT proposes can mark a new milestone for nonfungible tokens and the crypto market in general. The platform‚Äôs competitive advantage is its ability to adapt to emerging trends, banking on its NFT 2.0 protocol which is an essential element for building a thriving platform.

DareNFT will provide InPoker with the access to its ecosystem and the NFT marketplace where InPoker plans to list some of the Elite NFT membership cards. This long-term partnership marks a significant milestone in InPoker‚Äôs efforts to introduce the cutting edge technologies to online gaming.

Visit DareNFT: https://darenft.com/

Stay tuned for more exciting developments on https://www.inpoker.io

Join our official Telegram Channel here: https://t.me/influencerpoker

<response>
Health Is Not Fitness, But We Need Both.

In today's fast-paced world, the terms "health" and "fitness" are often used interchangeably, but they represent distinct concepts. Health encompasses a broad range of physical, mental, and social well-being, while fitness is more focused on physical activity and the maintenance of a healthy body. While both are crucial for a fulfilling life, they serve different purposes and should not be conflated.

To understand the distinction, let's consider a metaphor. Imagine a tree. The trunk and branches represent the physical structure and overall health of the tree. These elements are essential for the tree to grow and thrive, but they are not the entire picture. The leaves, flowers, and fruits are the fruits of the tree's labor, representing the benefits and outcomes of its health and fitness. Without the health of the tree, the leaves, flowers, and fruits would not be possible.

Health, in this context, is like the health of the tree. It includes factors such as a strong immune system, good mental health, and a balanced lifestyle. These elements are foundational and necessary for a healthy and fulfilling life. Fitness, on the other hand, is more like the leaves, flowers, and fruits of the tree. It involves regular physical activity, proper nutrition, and a healthy body, which contribute to the overall well-being and quality of life.

In conclusion, while health and fitness are interconnected and mutually beneficial, they are not the same. Health is the foundation upon which fitness is built, and fitness is the result of a healthy lifestyle. Both are essential for a balanced and fulfilling life, but they should be pursued separately and in harmony. Let us strive to maintain our health and engage in fitness activities that enhance our well-being, rather than viewing them as interchangeable concepts.
</response>
gts:
What is the meaning of fitness? Well, that depends on who you ask. The word fitness can be spread thin when it comes to defining what it is. Fitness can have a different meaning for different groups because it is activity-specific.

Physical fitness for a powerlifter is not the same kind of fitness for a triathlete. In general, physical fitness is being able to apply the required strength and energy to complete specific physical activities. If a powerlifter cannot complete a triathlon, then he would not be considered fit among a group of competing triathletes.

Health is different from fitness, but like fitness, there are variations of health. In general, health is being free from illness and sustaining overall wellness. Within this concept, the dimensions of health are physical, mental, and social. Having a healthy body that is not affected by disease or physical impairments is a general description of physical health.

Good mental health is more than just the absence of mental illness. It means you are in a state of well-being where you feel good and function well in the world. Some keys to being in a state of good mental health are:

the ability to learn

the ability to feel, express, and manage a range of positive and negative emotions

the ability to form and maintain good relationships with others

the ability to cope with and manage change and uncertainty.

The ability to develop and maintain quality friendships, stay true to yourself while adapting to social situations, and engage with others in your community (work, clubs, religious settings, etc.) are all signs of good social health.

Health and fitness are often conflated because neither can be attained without proper nutrition. Yes, your mental health is impacted by a poor diet. Nutritional information is a description of how you are either contributing to health and fitness, which are dimensions of wellness or feeding into sickness and disease.

As a game developer, you want to reach new markets, expand your business, increase your fan base and sales around the globe, but mostly in Western and Eastern Europe. What does it mean? And why is the German market important for the gaming industry? Which are its special characteristics that make you consider localizing your game for the German audience?

Well, let‚Äôs start with the beginning.

Expanding your game in Europe means you address a mature market. Generating revenue of $29.6 Billion in 2020 and having a 7.8% increase YoY, Europe is the third game market in the world, after Asia-Pacific and North America.

However, localization for the European market is complex, as the audience is very unique due to the variety of languages that they have in their respective countries in the region.

Typically, video games consumed in Europe would always receive translation and localization. If in the previous articles we explained why it‚Äôs important to localize for the Polish, Finish, Swedish, Dutch and Danish markets, with this post we‚Äôll start our series of articles about localization for Western Europe.

Basically, this means to translate and adapt your game from all points of view to the four audiences: French, Italian, German, and Spanish. This practice is so popular across many industries, that the translation made for this region even has received its own acronym ‚Äî FIGS or EFIGS if we also include English.

With a gaming industry revenue of $6,084 million, the German market was the fifth market around the world in 2020 and it‚Äôs also a very complex one. Therefore, we considered we should focus on this audience, helping you to better understand what the localization in the German language involves and how you could conquer this market.

In addition, our solid office chair with high back uses heavy-duty plates, legs and smooth PU casters, having a load-bearing capacity of 650 pounds.

Besides, this chair is made of cow full-grain leather with skin parts that have almost no defects, that is, there are no scars, moles or holes of any kind. This is why it does not require polishing. Extra-thick cushions and waterfall-style seat edges reduce pressure on your legs, back and hips, allowing you to sit comfortably for several hours. In addition, our high-density foam has better resilience and is not easy to deform.

The Liam Massage Executive Chair with backrest of our ergonomic three-stage can provide corresponding support for your waist, back, neck and head. The curved back can perfectly fit your spine and reduce back fatigue. In addition, this chair has seven automatic massage points with multiple vibrations, which can relieve sub-healthy body pain, muscle tension and soreness when sitting for a long time.

Liam Massage Executive Chair is a kind of chair that is absolutely necessary for office, which can give you everything you want!

gts:
3. $BRIX: Utility Token, Distribution & Use Cases

Your NFTs accumulate a utility token (‚Äú$BRIX‚Äù) which holders can exclusively claim on our website ‚Äî https://propertys.xyz. The go-live will be announced at the end of 2021.

Every month holders can claim $BRIX for the NFT cards they own. $BRIX is built for one purpose and one purpose only: to enable you to exchange for more NFTs & metaverse objects and exclusive access to events within the Property‚Äôs ecosystem.

$BRIX has no other functionality other than within the Property‚Äôs ecosystem, and it cannot be purchased from Property‚Äôs developers. Property‚Äôs developers do not provide or intend to provide a secondary market for $BRIX.

Do not expect monetary gains from $BRIX. $BRIX is not intended to give you financial rewards ‚Äî it will not ‚Äúmake you money‚Äù. $BRIX is intended to be used as a means of exchange for our digital and physical products & events ‚Äî it may ‚Äúsave you money‚Äù that you would otherwise have to pay to acquire these assets.

Claiming $BRIX

Every building has a unique, randomized code that can only be claimed once per period ‚Äî this prevents double-claiming on an NFT and keeps the tokenomics intact. The $BRIX you can claim depend on your holdings. Every holder regardless of the amount they may own is entitled to $BRIX if they register their holdings for a given period. The period is always a month.

4. Collecting Game: The Mechanics

Before we dive into the mechanics ‚Äî which are fairly simple ‚Äî it‚Äôs important to understand the distinction between special cards and regular cards and the way these regular cards can combine into pure & impure streets.

Card Tiers Single Houses Forming Pure Combos Forming Impure Combos Special Buildings $BRIX Bonuses

Card Tiers

There are 7 cities and 120 special buildings. The 7 cities are separated into 3 tiers ‚Äî giving low-high amounts of $BRIX. The 120 special buildings are separated into 20 of 20, 5 of 5, and 1 of 1 cards. Again lower to higher amounts of $BRIX.

Single Houses

A single house ‚Äî 1 NFT, collects $BRIX as standalone, you do not need to complete any of the combos to collect $BRIX. These combos give bonuses, but should not be the reason anyone is excluded from the Property‚Äôs ecosystem.

We‚Äôve made a number of changes to the Dexfolio app this week.

There‚Äôs a new update system in place to ensure that our public releases are stable. Updates are now first pushed out to testers to give us the opportunity to identify and resolve any issues prior to the update going live.

To become a tester and test the latest features before everybody else, you can click the links below:

Here‚Äôs what‚Äôs in this weeks open testing update

Improvements

Updated the token details page so that scrolling still works if you drag your finger over the graph area.

Better handling of backend timeout errors.

App optimization to reduce the delay on tap.

Security enhancements.

Bug Fixes

Fixed a bug that caused the user to have an empty portfolio when rebooting the app after an error occurred adding their wallet.

Fixed an issue in which a formatting error was preventing certain tokens from being added to users portfolios.

Fixed a bug that allowed for the ‚Äòterms of policy‚Äô box to be unticked.

üì±Dexfolio Official Links:

üì¢ Announcement Channel : http://t.me/dexfolio

üìß Telegram Channel : https://t.me/dexfolioChat

Website: http://dexfolio.org

system

The assistant is designed to be helpful, proactive, and highly interactive.

The assistant strives to accurately interpret the user's intent throughout the conversation, acknowledging previous interactions to maintain context and continuity. If the user's message is unclear or lacks necessary details, the assistant always asks for clarification rather than making assumptions. For example, if the user's request is incomplete, the assistant responds with: "Could you provide more details so I can assist you better?"

The assistant asks specific follow-up questions and offers suggestions based on the user's needs, avoiding vague or generic prompts. It proactively provides guidance and potential next steps, especially in complex tasks such as writing, analysis, coding, and question answering.

The assistant is mindful of how much content the user needs to read or type, keeping interactions concise and efficient. It reduces unnecessary repetition and ensures responses are relevant, well-structured, and free from errors. When presenting options or asking for feedback, the assistant simplifies interactions by offering multiple-choice answers or specific suggestions to make it easier for the user to respond quickly.

The assistant adapts its tone to align with the user's emotional state and style, adjusting its approach as needed. If uncertain about something, the assistant honestly says, "I don't know," and suggests ways for the user to find the information.

The assistant provides factually accurate, coherent, and relevant responses, using proper grammar and structure. It remains interactive and proactive across all tasks, continually seeking feedback to refine and improve interactions.

gts:
This is a confounding image because the juicy spinach wonton soup is apparently ruined by a cigarette butt. The large open tea egg at the bottom center intrigues me, as does the white powder next to it. In fact, it took a long time for me to diagnose it as a tea egg. Why did someone ruin the soup with the cigarette without even finishing the soup first?

The reason why the picture can spark such vivid scenarios in me must be due to the realism in its style, constructed using watercolor. This is no small feat technically. The white highlight dots scattered on top of the wontons and spinach contribute to the glossy wetness. The ingenious discoloration on some of the yellowed spinach, a sign of decay and imperfection, makes this soup even more convincing. Chopped spring onions and a fractured leaf of cilantro floating in the foreground invites the tongue to touch them. WHAT IS A HAIR TRANSPLANT?

Hair transplant is a surgical technique that involves removing hair follicles from one part of the body, known as the donor area, to a bald or thinning part of the body known as the recipient area.

The surgeon generally moves hair from the reverse or backside of the head to the front or top of the head.

VHCA Hair Transplant Clinic performs hair transplantation procedures under anesthesia.

Pattern baldness is responsible for the majority of hair loss. This comes down to genetics. The remaining cases are due to a variety of factors, including.

diet

stress

illness

hormonal imbalance

medications

If anyone is looking for Best Hair Transplant Clinic in India then he/she should surely consult VHCA Hair Clinic, because it‚Äôs India's first Ayurvedic Hair Clinic.

WHAT HAPPENS DURING A HAIR TRANSPLANT?

VHCA Hair Clinic is the best hair transplant clinic in India as here doctors have more than 25 plus years of expertise and have performed more than 3000 hair transplants.

The process of extracting hair from one area and transferring them to another area is called hair transplant. In routine practice, this kind of hair transplantation has been done in the past to treat Alopecia disorders, and nowadays even eyebrows, mustache, and beard hair are being transplanted. The area from where the hair is extracted is called the donor area and the area where the hair is implanted is called the recipient area.

WHAT HAPPENS AFTER A HAIR TRANSPLANT?

VHCA Hair Transplant Clinic ‚Äî the best hair transplant clinic in India after completing the Hair Transplants procedures, gives a follow-up therapy with ayurvedic medicines such as:

Ayurvedic Medicines to support hair growth in hair follicles.

Some anti-inflammatory medicines.

Some medicines o make the healing fast.

Most of the people after taking hair transplants from VHCA Hair Transplant Clinic can return to work after 5 to 7 days, or in some other cases, a patient has to take rest for some 7 to 15 days even.

Due to the NHL‚Äôs proactive COVID postponements, we have a little bit of a smaller slate with just two games going on. Still have a pick for you though. I‚Äôll be using FanDuel. If you haven‚Äôt signed up with them yet, you can do that HERE and get a risk-free bet up to $1,000.

Wild ML (+104) vs Stars

As of now, this is my only pick for the night. Both teams haven‚Äôt been their best as of late. The Stars had lost 4 straight before a 4‚Äì3 OT win over the Blackhawks on Saturday. The Wild have dropped their last 3. The Wild have been the more consistent team all year, and at plus money on the ML I like taking a chance on them. Minnesota despite their recent struggles still leads the Central and they‚Äôre scoring over 3.6 goals per game. After a two-ish week stretch of great defense and goaltending, that‚Äôs come back down to earth a little bit for Dallas. Let‚Äôs take the plus money here and see what happens.

gts:
Speak Spanish From Day One.

The first thing I discovered upon my arrival in Caracas was that I remembered much less Spanish than I thought I did. As it had been over five years since I had taken a Spanish course I guess I really shouldn‚Äôt have been surprised right? Who can really expect to remember much from a high school course that was mediocre at best? As I tried desperately to order a simple sandwich and something to drink, I realized that if I didn‚Äôt at least attempt to learn Spanish I would most likely starve after a week or so.

How exactly does one go about learning Spanish in a Latin American country? Seems pretty easy right? Well, I assure you it is not, especially when your entire day is spent speaking English. Another obstacle that I quickly encountered was the very rapid way in which everyone speaks in this city. It is amazing how a sentence containing 10 words or so can come out sounding almost like one long word. Is that what English sounds like to people who don‚Äôt speak English? It is exceedingly difficult to learn words in another language when you are unable to decipher exactly where one word ends and another begins. This process is made even harder by the fact that most people here fail to pronounce the whole word anyway. There were many words that I was convinced I knew and was using quite frequently. Imagine my dismay when I found out they had whole other syllables on the end of the word. No wonder I had been getting funny looks from people on the street and in restaurants.

I eventually came to the conclusion that an actual course was needed or even better, a private tutor of some sort. The only way I was ever going to learn Spanish was by actually sitting down and studying with someone who could answer the myriad of questions that arose every day. Sad isn‚Äôt it? Here I sit, living in a Latin American country and I am unable to pick up the language without resorting to private lessons. Some people seem to have an ear for languages and can pick them up simply by listening, too bad I will never be one of those people.

ACCESS SPANISH LANGUAGE COURSES RIGHT NOW
