Job Title: Waiter/Waitress ‚Äî Mada Hotels Jobs 2021

Organization: Mada Hotels

Duty Station: Jinja, Uganda

Mada Hotels Profile

Founded in 1982, Mada Hotels is one of East Africa‚Äôs leading hospitality service providers with properties spread throughout East Africa. Adventures Aloft Balloon Safaris is part of Mada services and offers Africa‚Äôs most famous game reserves including the Masai Mara, Serengeti and Tarangire National Park. They opened a new property in Namanve, Mukono called Kampala Nile Resort.

Job Summary

Waiters assist restaurant patrons by noting their order, serving tables their requested meals, and preparing bills at the end of the table‚Äôs meal. Waiters are also responsible for asking customers if they are satisfied with their meal and providing any assistance should the customer not be satisfied.

To be successful as a waiter you must have the endurance to stand for long hours and have patience with difficult customers. A good waiter anticipates the needs of customers and provides all services in a friendly manner.

Roles and Responsibilities:

- Greet customers and hand out menus.



- Take meal and beverage orders from customers and place these orders in the kitchen.



- Make menu recommendations and inform patrons of any specials.



- Deliver meals and beverages to tables when they have been prepared.



- Check that customers are satisfied with their meal.



- Prepare the bill for tables when requested.



- Cash up bills and ensure that the correct amount has been paid.



- Administer change to tables if needed.

Minimum Qualifications

- The applicant for the Mada Hotels Waiter/Waitress job should hold relevant qualifications



- Experience in the hospitality industry is required

How To Apply for Mada Hotels Jobs 2021

All candidates who wish to join the Mada Hotels in this capacity should Email a complete CV and cover letter to: fnbjnr@madahotels.com Or deliver physical copies to Jinja Nile Resort, Kimaka Road, Jinja, Uganda

Deadline: 25th December 2021

For similar Jobs in Uganda today and great Uganda jobs, please remember to subscribe using the form below:

NOTE:

No employer should ask you for money in return for advancement in the recruitment process or for being offered a position. Please contact Fresher Jobs Uganda if it ever happens with any of the jobs that we advertise.

Facebook



WhatsApp



Twitter



LinkedIn

The assistant is designed to be helpful, proactive, and highly interactive.

The assistant strives to accurately interpret the user's intent throughout the conversation, acknowledging previous interactions to maintain context and continuity. If the user's message is unclear or lacks necessary details, the assistant always asks for clarification rather than making assumptions. For example, if the user's request is incomplete, the assistant responds with: "Could you provide more details so I can assist you better?"

The assistant asks specific follow-up questions and offers suggestions based on the user's needs, avoiding vague or generic prompts. It proactively provides guidance and potential next steps, especially in complex tasks such as writing, analysis, coding, and question answering.

The assistant is mindful of how much content the user needs to read or type, keeping interactions concise and efficient. It reduces unnecessary repetition and ensures responses are relevant, well-structured, and free from errors. When presenting options or asking for feedback, the assistant simplifies interactions by offering multiple-choice answers or specific suggestions to make it easier for the user to respond quickly.

The assistant adapts its tone to align with the user's emotional state and style, adjusting its approach as needed. If uncertain about something, the assistant honestly says, "I don't know," and suggests ways for the user to find the information.

The assistant provides factually accurate, coherent, and relevant responses, using proper grammar and structure. It remains interactive and proactive across all tasks, continually seeking feedback to refine and improve interactions.

gts:
How do sparkling wine producers adopt a sub-appellation? Evidence from an exploratory study on heroic Prosecco Superiore Rive

Luigino Barisan, Research Center for the Viticulture and Enology (CIRVE)

Luigi Galletto, University of Padua, Research Center for the Viticulture and Enology (CIRVE)

This paper investigates why wineries producing Conegliano Valdobbiadene Prosecco Protected Denomination of Origin (CVPP) wines decided to adopt the sub-appellation (SA) ‚ÄúRive‚Äù as a way to increase the value of their wines.

We estimated both a logistic and a linear regression to explain Rive SA firms‚Äô choices and market growth drivers, respectively. By using data gathered from CVPP producers, we divided wineries into two groups, those that have adopted the Rive SA and those that have not. By means of a stepwise procedure, we categorized factors that were likely to explain the Rive SA choice within a set of structural, marketing and wine tourism-related variables.

The results showed that structural drivers such as the human capital of younger producers, pressure tank sizes, competitive positioning in the market and in the field of wine tourism hospitality, and involvement in ad hoc promotional activities (i.e., Primavera del Prosecco) have the greatest effects on the choice of the Rive SA. The synergistic effects of cellar door sales, small firm sizes and specific foreign markets (i.e., the United Kingdom and the United States) have emerged, on the other hand, as vital factors in the growth of the Rive SA in terms of market share.

The adoption of the Rive SA may play an important role in supporting and valuing the heroic viticulture-based economy and may help the CVPP Tutelary Consortium to appropriately undertake promotional strategies to differentiate wines and improve competitiveness. This could have positive effects on wine tourism, hospitality and winery visits in light of the recent recognition of the CVPP as the 55th Italian UNESCO World Heritage site.

DOI: https://doi.org/10.36253/wep-9900

Read Full Text: https://oaj.fupress.net/index.php/wep/article/view/9900

gts:
Step 1: Brainstorming and Formulation of Ideas

The tone and the information should be understandable to the particular audience you are speaking to. Try to answer the obvious questions and build a relationship from early on.

Learn as much as possible about the topic and use common questions to expand your learning horizon.

Step 2: Speech Writing

In the beginning, the first thing you must do is to write down topics you want to focus on in bullet points with one or two sentences.

When writing distinguish three clear parts as Introduction, Description, and Conclusion. Here are some tips:

Startup with a curious fact, a Dramatic question, a quote, or a Story.

Be positive.

Make it short. Around 20 minutes.

The audience must know the problem and the proposed solution by the end.

Summarize before you finish.

Follow up with a motivating or inspiring finish.

Step 3: Practicing

The target is being natural while speaking. An occasional glance at your notes should be enough to remember. Here are some tips for practicing:

Practice in front of a mirror a few times. Get feedback from a friend.

Audiences are eager to hear what you have to say. So be clear and prompt.

Relevant gestures, occasional movement, and eye contact are very impactful. So use them often.

Keep your notes on the podium, and walk around.

Step 4: Visualize

Visualization of your topic and related things can be a very powerful thing if you do it right. Use PowerPoint presentations, photos, charts, and videos to make your point.

Keep in mind:

Hariprasath critiques the Duckworth-Lewis (D/L) rule for its complexity, which can lead to unpredictable outcomes in cricket matches. The rule was introduced in 1992 during the World Cup, where a team was able to score 22 runs in just one ball, leading to a controversial decision. This incident highlighted the rule's limitations and the need for a more nuanced approach.

In the 2003 World Cup, South Africa faced Sri Lanka in a crucial match. The D/L rule was applied, and a dropped single by Mark Boucher was a pivotal moment. This dropped single led to a significant change in the match's dynamics, as the D/L rule dictated that Sri Lanka would be awarded more runs, potentially altering the outcome of the match.

The D/L rule is designed to ensure that the match continues in a fair and consistent manner, but its application can be complex and sometimes lead to unexpected results. Hariprasath argues that the rule should be simplified to better reflect the actual conditions of the game, ensuring that the match's outcome is more closely tied to the teams' performances rather than the arbitrary application of the rule.

Would you like more details on the specific conditions that led to the dropped single and how it affected the match?

gts:
By Hariprasath

Many matches have been turned on its head by the Duckworth Lewis method especially the South African side were always on the wrong side of the result. Even the cricket pundits had difficulty in grasping this rule. The complexity of this rule has led to many controversies, and the difficulty involved in calculating the appropriate score in the rain-affected matches has led to many chaotic situations.

The controversy regarding this rule was raised at the infamous semifinal in the 1992 world cup. South Africa's side was on the verge of victory before the rain interrupted. South Africa needed 22 of 13 to win before rain interrupted. Ten minutes later, the South African side was informed that they need to score 22 of 1 ball, and this incident raised all sorts of heated discussion on the Duckworth Lewis rule.

In the version of D/L most commonly in use in international and first-class matches (the ‚ÄòProfessional Edition‚Äô), the target for Team 2 is adjusted simply in proportion to the two teams‚Äô resources, i.e.,

For example, if a rain delay means that Team 2 only has 70% of resources available, and Team 1 scored 220 with 100% of resources available, then 220 √ó 70% / 100% = 154, so Team 2‚Äôs target is 154, and the score to tie is 153. The actual resource values used in the Professional Edition are not publicly available, so a computer that has this software loaded must be used.

The other instance where South Africa ended up on the wrong side of the result was at the 2003 world cup. South Africa misread the instructions and Mark Boucher blocked the ball, while a single would have ensured a win for them.

Accounts from Incomplete Records refer to financial records that do not contain all the necessary information. This can happen due to various reasons such as missing transactions, errors, or incomplete data entry. These accounts are used to provide a partial picture of financial transactions, which can be useful for preliminary analysis or when full records are not available.

In contrast, the double-entry system is a more comprehensive method where every financial transaction is recorded in two accounts: one as a debit and the other as a credit. This ensures that the total debits equal the total credits, maintaining the balance in the accounting system. The double-entry system is more accurate and reliable but requires more detailed records.

I hope this explanation helps. If you have any specific questions or need further clarification, feel free to ask.
</response>
gts:
Accounting records, which aren‚Äôt strictly kept consistent with the double-entry bookkeeping system are referred to as Accounts from incomplete records. Many authors describe it as a single entry system.

However, a single-entry bookkeeping system may be a misnomer because there‚Äôs no such system for maintaining accounting records. It is also not a ‚Äòshortcut‚Äô method as an alternate to the double-entry bookkeeping system. It is rather a mechanism of maintaining records whereby some transactions are recorded with proper debits and credits while just in the case of others, either one-sided or no entry is formed.

Accounts from Incomplete Records

Normally, under this technique records of money and private accounts of debtors and creditors are properly maintained, while the knowledge concerning assets, liabilities, expenses and revenues is partially recorded. Hence, these are usually referred to as accounts from incomplete records.

For more details please visit:https://www.manishco.com/accounts-from-incomplete-records/

gts:
A lot of you might live in apartments with thin walls and feel embarrassed about singing and especially practicing those vocal exercises comfortably where others can here you. I know many of you resort to practicing in the car.

Some of you, are regular travelers and need to find a place whilst on the road, where you can still exercise the voice without feeling inhibited‚Ä¶staying in hotels.

When on stage for a performance, this is the part of us that we are happy to show to the world. The finished product. But the preparation to get us ready to be there, where we might make mistakes, we are experimenting, learning, warming up, trying new material‚Ä¶that is commonly the side of singing and public speaking which is not a public affair. We need to find a place where we are comfortable to perform these tasks.

As a singer and speaker, and particularly, someone who is establishing new techniques, it is important to exercise the voice on a daily basis. Your voice coach will hopefully have given you exercises to improve your breathing, strengthen your vocal cords, improve your range, pitch and vocal stamina.

So can you get over the phobia of practising when other people might hear you?

Firstly, I say‚Ä¶don‚Äôt be shy to be warming up your voice. It‚Äôs part of the preparation and it‚Äôs what will make you sound awesome on stage, and in everyday life as well as a speaker. If your a singer or a public speaker and your your good enough to have a gig, anyone hearing your warmups will not be thinking‚Ä¶oMg what an awful singer next door. Quite the opposite. Be bold and do what you have to do. Invite your neighbours to your gigs, rehearsals or to hear your run through your presentation or keynote.

Same when you are in a hotel. Who cares‚Ä¶you will most likely not have to see these guests again.

As for practicing in your car. It‚Äôs not a bad idea. Posture is not the best. But if you feel you have more privacy here and will be more effective then, it‚Äôs better than nothing at all. I do however recommend that you pull over and practice for the 10‚Äì20mins on the side of the road. Singing and vocalisation exercises can take quite a lot of concentration and some people even find the breathing can make them feel dizzy, so driving at the same time is not recommended.

Mariners lifer, Kyle Seager is closing the MLB chapter of his career. After 11 seasons in the game with his one and only team, Seager has announced that he is retiring from baseball. Gianmarco Castronovo reflects on the 3rd baseman‚Äôs career:

Well, it may be sad news for Mariners fans and a shock all around for baseball spectators alike. But for Kyle Seager, who announced his retirement on Wednesday with a Twitter post from his wife, Julie Seager ‚Äî the career-long Mariner is ‚Äúunbelievably excited for the next chapter of [his] life.‚Äù

Gianmarco Castronovo is sad to see Kyle Seager go from the game. But he is pleased to know that the third baseman closed out his career on a high note. 2021 was a strong season for Seager, who hit 35 home runs with 101 RBIs ‚Äî career highs for the 34-year-old soon-to-be MLB retiree. In fact, Seattle is pretty surprised by this development because his year was so strong! Nevertheless, the team and its fans gave Seager a fond farewell in an emotional send-off that had nearly every Mariner in tears on the last day of the season.

It is still unclear why exactly Kyle Seager has decided to retire somewhat prematurely. Mariners fans and MLB supporters, like Castronovo, wish him luck in his next chapter!

gts:
RKI urges ‚Äúmaximum contact restrictions‚Äù

The Robert Koch Institute sees Germany at the beginning of a new corona wave caused by the omicron variant. Now the RKI advises clear measures ‚Äî ‚Äúimmediately‚Äù and until next year. Mochi Dec 21, 2021¬∑3 min read

spiegel.de 21.12.2021‚Äì12:55 a.m.

Translated by Michele Corlito

RKI head Lothar Wieler Photo: ANNEGRET HILSE / REUTERS

The Robert Koch Institute (RKI) has called for clear measures in light of the recent spread of the coronavirus variant. In a tweet, the RKI recommended, among other things, ‚Äú maximal contact restrictions‚Äù and ‚Äúmaximal preventive measures against infections‚Äù.

The booster and first-time vaccination campaign must also be continued at full speed, he said. Travel should be reduced to what is absolutely necessary. In addition, the RKI advocated ‚Äúintensive ongoing communication to ensure understanding of the measures.

The RKI states that the probably even more infectious omicron variant of the coronavirus could account for the majority of infection cases in Germany as early as the beginning of January 2022. Accordingly, the RKI expects several tens of thousands of cases of infection every day.

Contact restrictions planned from December 28

In a draft bill for the meeting between Chancellor Olaf Scholz (SPD) and the heads of the federal states, for example, indoor clubs and discos are to be closed and dance events banned from December 28th at the latest. Also from December 28, only a maximum of ten vaccinated and recovered persons are to be allowed to meet privately ‚Äî indoors and outdoors. Children 14 and under are not to be counted. However, it‚Äôs still possible that the draft resolution will be further modified or amended before Today‚Äôs meeting begins.

Great! Here‚Äôs a concise overview of key steps to evaluate Facebook ads and focus on the metrics:

1. **Set Clear Objectives**: Define what you want to achieve with your ads (e.g., brand awareness, lead generation).
2. **Audience Targeting**: Ensure your ads reach the right audience.
3. **Ad Creative**: Focus on compelling visuals and engaging copy.
4. **Ad Placement**: Place ads where your target audience is most likely to see them.
5. **A/B Testing**: Continuously test different ad variations to optimize performance.

**Metrics to Focus On**:
- **Click-Through Rate (CTR)**: The percentage of people who click on your ad.
- **Conversion Rate**: The percentage of people who complete the desired action (e.g., purchase, sign up).
- **Cost Per Click (CPC)**: The average amount you pay for each click.
- **Return on Ad Spend (ROAS)**: The revenue generated from ad spend.

**Funnel Perspective**:
- **First Touchpoint**: Ads are the initial interaction with cold audiences.
- **Thumbnail Effectiveness**: Use the formula: 3-second video plays / total video plays = effectiveness%.

**Scroll-Stopping Impact**:
- **Scroll-Stopper Ads**: These are the top-performing ads that keep users engaged and encourage them to scroll further down the page.
- **Impact on Funnel**: If scroll-stopping ads underperform, it can negatively impact the entire conversion funnel, as users may not engage with subsequent content.

Feel free to add more details if needed!

Facebook

KNOW WHAT TO LOOK FOR!

Before we dive in,we have to first define the function of FB ads in a funnel and understand that regardless of their object(which is usally sales/leads)

Ads are just 1 out of many elements that have to work together in order to generate a sale/lead.

From this perspective,we look at cold audience ads as the initial contact with (your) brand,and as such ‚Äî their function is to:

Grab attention relay the message(offer,product etc‚Ä¶) peak the audience interest push the traffic to the landing page

STEP 1:

Is your video ad stopping scrolls?

if it ain‚Äôt, that the majority of your reach doesn‚Äôt even dedicated the time to view your ad,rendering the rest the funnel

RELEVENT METRICS:

Reach Video Plays Second Video Plays

WHAT IF YOU DONT MEET THESE CRITERIA?

If your ad isn‚Äôt stopping scrolls,that points toward the following:

Thumbnail isn‚Äôt effective First 3 seconds of the video sucks The offer isn‚Äôt relevant to the audience

STEP 2 :

Is your thumbnail effective?

usually, we will test at least 5‚Äì10 thumbnails in order to determine this,butif you haven‚Äôt conducted an A/B test, here is how you can be more certain that the thumbnails is ineffective

RELEVANT MATRICS:

Reach Video plays 3-second video plays Thumb effectiveness

FORMULA:

3-second video/video plays=Effectiveness%

Anything below 35% is not as optimized as it should be,and it will most likely prove inferior in stopping the scrolls.

THIS DOSEN‚ÄôT MEAN IT WON‚ÄôT GENERATE SALES, IT JUST MEANS IT COULD DO BETTER!

THANK YOU, HAVE A NICE DAY!

The assistant strives to accurately interpret the user's intent throughout the conversation, acknowledging previous interactions to maintain context and continuity. If the user's message is unclear or lacks necessary details, the assistant always asks for clarification rather than making assumptions. For example, if the user's request is incomplete, the assistant responds with: "Could you provide more details so I can assist you better?"

The assistant asks specific follow-up questions and offers suggestions based on the user's needs, avoiding vague or generic prompts. It proactively provides guidance and potential next steps, especially in complex tasks such as writing, analysis, coding, and question answering.

The assistant is mindful of how much content the user needs to read or type, keeping interactions concise and efficient. It reduces unnecessary repetition and ensures responses are relevant, well-structured, and free from errors. When presenting options or asking for feedback, the assistant simplifies interactions by offering multiple-choice answers or specific suggestions to make it easier for the user to respond quickly.

The assistant adapts its tone to align with the user's emotional state and style, adjusting its approach as needed. If uncertain about something, the assistant honestly says, "I don't know," and suggests ways for the user to find the information.

The assistant provides factually accurate, coherent, and relevant responses, using proper grammar and structure. It remains interactive and proactive across all tasks, continually seeking feedback to refine and improve interactions.

gts:
Repossession, produced, written and directed by Ming Siu Goh and Scott C. Hillyard, will see a North America release via Digital on Tuesday, 21 December 2021. The film, seen at various film festivals including Cinequest Film Festival, Dances With Films Festival, and the Singapore Chinese Film Festival, garnered much positive feedback.

Video Credit: Film Threat

The horror film, distributed by Gravitas Ventures and Kamikaze Dogfight, revolves around 50-year-old Jim. Jim has managed to construct for himself a perfect life in the world‚Äôs most expensive city. Curiously, when Jim is unexpectedly laid off, he desperately clings onto the symbols of his success. Not long thereafter, plauged by his past, we find Jim wrestling with resurfacing demons.

Repossession, frequently compared to Jordan Peele‚Äôs Get Out (2017) and Bong Joon Ho‚Äôs Parasite (2019), stars Gerald Chew as Jim. Chew‚Äôs previous work includes The Tattooist (2007), Apprentice (2016), and Wonder Boy (2017). More recently, playing Tommy ‚ÄòThe Scorpion‚Äô Chow, the actor could be seen in the Dean Devlin/Gary Rosen co-created television series Almost Paradise.

Video Credit: Cinequest

Further to Chew, playing supporting characters, Repossession also stars Amy Cheng, Sivakumar Palakrishnan, Rachel Wan, Matthew Loo, Ming Siu Goh, and Scott C. Hillyard. Repossession, with Siang Seng Goh, Alex Low and Mun Yang Tham serving as co-producers, comes to Digital on Tuesday, 21 December 2021.

gts:
Photo by Canva Studio from Pexels

Digital enterprises or online businesses are not bound by geography or stringent local regulations.

This makes it easier to start a business but it doesn‚Äôt make running the business any easier. Competition is fierce in almost every niche. Whatever your niche is, you should validate it by researching your competition. Let us explain how you should go about this and also why.

Step 1: Demand and Supply

The essence of most businesses can be boiled down to one reality, demand and supply.

If there is enough demand then you can cater to the supply. If there isn‚Äôt enough demand, then catering to supply doesn‚Äôt make any sense.

If there is only one diner in a locality, then it is likely to do well. If there are too many diners and not many people to fill up all those places, then most of those enterprises will run out of business.

Likewise, a digital enterprise or any online niche must have enough demand for there to be space to exist. While firms or endeavours can always coexist, the pie gets smaller and there is just less in it for everyone. The hard reality is that if there are enough players in a niche already and some of them have already amassed a massive market share, then penetrating their share or usurping a chunk of it will be a herculean task.

Study your competition to find out how large a market is and if some of your competitors are already catering to the needs of the audience. If you intend to do the same thing in the same niche, then there is little or no possibility for your enterprise to find a foothold, let aside being a roaring success.

Step 2: Niche within a Niche!

It is unlikely that the niche you have planned to target will be completely void of competition. There may be stiff or less competition. If there are players already with humongous market shares and dedicated customers or audiences, then you need to find a niche within a niche. You cannot cater to the same exact niche that your competition is committed to.

For instance, if you are planning to target the niche of food, cuisine or anything culinary, then you can find some subset that the existing players have not touched upon yet. If that is not possible, then you must figure out what you are best at and use that authority to create a niche within a niche.

It is all about the value you can offer to your audience and how you help, change or enrich their lives.

gts:
But but blockchain is for criminals‚Ä¶

Too many times have we heard this argument. It is almost a meme by now. It is a bit true, but also a lot wrong. The main issue with blockchain technology is the anonymity of blockchain wallets. Fun fact: Did you know that you can just generate your own blockchain wallet offline? The whole idea behind wallet creation is not that you and only you have access to your wallet only, but that everyone who has the same private key as you also has the same wallet. The ‚Äúsecurity‚Äù only stems from one aspect: Stochastics! Two people have a very very low chance to create the same wallet. For example, MetaMask creates them using 2048 seed words. In total, you need 12 of them to create a wallet. Therefore, there are 204‚Å∏¬π¬≤ possibilities. Does not sound like a lot but this number is equal to 5444517871000000000000000000000000000000000000000. In truth some additional requirements must be satisfied, therefore a lot less combinations exist, but for simplicity we abstract from these here. All of these wallets are therefore entirely anonymous. The only way to know who has access to which address is by creating a mapping between a person‚Äôs real identity and the wallet address they have used for a transaction. Therefore, India could try to force its citizens to only pay from verified wallet addresses. India could force its companies to only accept payments from verified wallets. But, agreeably, there are still plenty of possibilities on how to still exploit the anonymity of blockchain for shady activities. There‚Äôs one crucial aspect to the blockchain though: It keeps a log of every transaction ever executed forever, redundantly backed up on thousands or even millions of servers worldwide. Further, these logs are publicly accessible by everyone at any given time. Blockchain technology can therefore also substantially enhance transparency and reveal monetary flows across the world. It acts as an ultimate threat: Yes, you can engage in illegal transactions, but should your wallet address ever become traceable back to you, even if only by accident, everyone can see what you‚Äôve done. Therefore, India should not ban ‚Äúprivate‚Äù (i.e.. ‚Äúdecentralized‚Äù) blockchains, but rather embrace them and build systems around them to enhance both their transparency and security.

As offices are reopening after the pandemic, people are more concerned about cleaning and hygiene. Almost 73% of people think their workplace should be cleaned daily. A clean and happy work environment is important for the health of employees and it boosts work productivity.

A commercial cleaning solution can help deep clean your office and make it look great. With so many options around, if you are confused about choosing the best professional office cleaning services, we are here to help you with some easy, effective tips. Read this post and hire the right cleaning company for your workplace.

References and Reviews

The first step is to prepare a list of past or current clients and know their experience. If you don‚Äôt want to get in touch with clients directly, do a little research. The cleaning company‚Äôs online presence will help you learn about them. Search for a cleaning company in your location and read their reviews.

Attention to Detail

One of the most common concerns is that cleaners forget to clean the smaller areas. So, if you want to avoid this, have a discussion with the cleaners and share your expectations with them. Ask if they clean all areas, like corners, under desks, cobwebs and crumbs. Also, go through the checklist of cleaning companies to understand all the areas they cover.

A Knowledgeable Cleaner and Cleaning Process

When you hire the best commercial cleaning services for the workplace, their staff is knowledgeable and experienced. So, make sure you discuss the expertise and experience of their cleaners, the cleaning process and the products they will use. Only professional cleaners ensure thorough cleaning and proper sanitation.

Budget-Friendly Services

Keeping your budget in mind is essential before hiring any service. A higher price doesn‚Äôt always mean high quality services. So, find a cleaning company that plans a work schedule according to your needs, time and budget.

Wrapping Up

We hope this post helps you find a cleaning company that best suits your needs. For workplace cleaning services in New Orleans, count on a reliable, professional cleaning company like Maid in NOLA‚Ñ¢. Get top quality cleaning services from expert cleaners and make your office a clean, happy place to work.

MedlinePlus Genetics ‚Äî summary generated by Brevi Assistant

Gestational diabetes is a problem characterized by abnormally high blood glucose levels while pregnant. Affected women do not have diabetes before they are expecting, and most of these women go back to being nondiabetic not long after the baby is born. Additionally, about half of women with gestational diabetes develop an additional kind of diabetes, called type 2 diabetes, within a few years after their maternity. Babies whose mothers have gestational diabetes are also more probable to create dangerously reduced blood sugar level levels soon after birth. Laron disorder is an uncommon type of short stature that results from the body‚Äôs inability to make use of development hormonal agent, a substance generated by the brain‚Äôs pituitary gland that assists advertise growth. The signs and signs and symptoms of Laron syndrome vary, also among affected members of the exact same family. Studies recommend that people with Laron syndrome have a significantly reduced danger of cancer and type 2 diabetes. Nevertheless, people with Laron disorder do not seem to have an enhanced life expectancy compared to their unaffected loved ones. Type 2 diabetes is a problem identified by unusually high blood sugar degrees. When blood sugar level degrees are high, the pancreatic releases insulin to relocate the excess glucose into cells, which minimizes the amount of sugar in the blood. The majority of people who establish type 2 diabetes first have insulin resistance, a condition in which the body‚Äôs cells make use of insulin less effectively than typical. Over time, the beta cells become much less able to reply to blood sugar level modifications, bringing about an insulin lack that protects against the body from reducing blood glucose levels effectively.

The Rubbish Project is a company on a mission to create a waste-free world by providing circular economy solutions to the planet‚Äôs messiest problem, Rubbish.

They work with businesses to create closed loop supply chains, transitioning from a wasteful linear model of consumption to a sustainable circular one. They bring products and systems to market which make true environmental sense by considering the entire lifecycle of the product, and the material that it‚Äôs made from.

The Rubbish Project, has developed a circular economy system, which has been adopted by packing companies including Huhtamaki to expand their sustainable packaging solutions worldwide. In essence Huhtamaki supply disposable products to their clients and The Rubbish Projects mission is to track those products throughout their lifecycle, capture them at the end of life, and recycle them returning the raw material to Huhtamaki so they can make new products. The best example of this is their closed loop system for RPET cups, these cups can be made from 100% recycled material, and they collect them and recycle them back into new cups.

$BEACH understands that as part of the ecosystem, circular economies are required to process all the plastics that we are removing from our beaches and oceans. The Rubbish Project is a stand out example of how this can be achieved and $BEACH are delighted to be a cornerstone partner in their journey.

gts:
If you currently live in India and are looking to invest in reAlpha, we have good news for you. We‚Äôve put together this blog post detailing exactly how to invest in reAlpha from India ‚Äî complete with all of the steps you need to take in order to transfer your funds successfully.

First, here is a rough overview of the steps you will need to take to complete the investment process:

Sign the subscriber agreement on the Dealmaker portal under ‚ÄúGlobal Investors.‚Äù Select ‚Äúwire transfer‚Äù as the payment method. Make a note of the unique wire instructions you receive via your signup email. Initiate the wire transfer from your bank account by following the steps below.

In order to initiate the transfer through remittance, you will need to follow these instructions. (Please note that this will be a capital account transaction.)

Log into your bank account. Click on ‚Äúpay and transfer‚Äù or ‚Äúpayments.‚Äù Choose the account from which you want to pay. Select ‚Äúinternational beneficiary account‚Äù or ‚Äúadd beneficiary.‚Äù Please note that you must fill in the full address of the beneficiary. Type in the amount you would like to invest in USD. (You can find a helpful currency converter here.) Please note, the minimum investment amount is $1,000 USD. Select the appropriate dropdown for charges and choose ‚ÄúPortfolio Investment in Equity Shares‚Äù or a similar option. The purpose of remittance can be ‚ÄúInvestment abroad in equities/equity shares,‚Äù ‚ÄúPortfolio Investment Abroad ‚Äî in Equities,‚Äù or ‚ÄúOverseas investment in equity shares.‚Äù Fill out the beneficiary reference field based on the guidelines you received in your wire instructions email that you made note of in step 3. Read and accept the declaration. Click continue. Accept the terms and conditions. Review the information you have entered and confirm you have submitted the remittance request successfully. Please note the transaction reference number and keep it in a safe place!

This investment can be made under the Liberalised Remittance Scheme (LRS) of RBI.

If your bank asks for an agreement in order to make the transfer, send them the subscriber agreement you signed on the Dealmaker portal. Wire transfers from India will come as SWIFT payments. The SWIFT code will be provided along with beneficiary details after signing the form on the Dealmaker portal.

https://www.realpha.com/blog/investing-in-realpha-from-india

‚ÄòPrint the Legend‚Äô

The race to bring 3-D printing technology to consumers. The fight between the big guns and the small startups is a reality where it's easy for these big companies to quash startup innovations like MakerBot or Formlabs. But it is seen that even after the fierce competition these startups were on their path to success because of their idea, engineering and determination. This documentary has to be the best one I have seen so far in class.

MakerBot which started as a small startup grew to great heights. They wanted to keep their data open-source so that there would be no barrier to innovation as they started to grow they switch to closed source, the foundation on which the company was built had changed.

There is a good and evil side to everything and the same with these 3D printers. The documentary showed people using it to make guns and also for prosthetics.

The start of Formlabs brought a new way of 3D printing with lasers, the end product was more precise and of high quality. Their growth from starting Kickstarter to raise money to getting a lot of orders to finally being able to dispatch the products even after a lot of problems like months of delay and also shift in administration was a nice inspiring journey to watch.

Nasdaq-listed Microstrategy has bought more bitcoin for its corporate treasury. The latest purchase for 1,914 coins has raised the company‚Äôs total cryptocurrency holdings to 124,391 bitcoins. CEO Michael Saylor recently said that he expects the price of the cryptocurrency to eventually reach $6 million.

Microstrategy Has Purchased More Bitcoin

The pro-bitcoin Nasdaq-listed company Microstrategy has purchased 1,914 more BTC. With the latest purchase, the company now holds 124,391 bitcoins. Microstrategy CEO Michael Saylor announced Thursday via Twitter:

Microstrategy has purchased an additional 1,914 bitcoins for ~$94.2 million in cash at an average price of ~$49,229 per bitcoin.

‚ÄúAs of 12/29/21 we hodl ~124,391 bitcoins acquired for ~$3.75 billion at an average price of ~$30,159 per bitcoin,‚Äù he detailed.

The price of BTC fell slightly Thursday. At the time of writing, it is hovering at about $47,398 after losing 1.4% over the last 24 hours. At the current price, Microstrategy‚Äôs BTC stash is worth about $5.9 billion.

The pro-bitcoin CEO of Microstrategy personally owns about 17,732 BTC. He recently said that he expects the price of the cryptocurrency to hit $600,000 a coin and eventually reach $6 million.

Saylor repeatedly said that bitcoin will replace gold. ‚ÄúOnce upon a time, gold was the most desirable store of value. Now bitcoin is taking its place,‚Äù he tweeted earlier this month. In November, he said that bitcoin is ‚Äúunstoppable‚Äù and will ‚Äúemerge as a $100 trillion asset class.‚Äù Furthermore, the CEO noted that ‚ÄúInflation is the problem and bitcoin is the solution.‚Äù

What do you think about Microstrategy buying more bitcoin? Let us know in the comments section below.

gts:
A tenth person has died from injuries suffered at last weekend‚Äôs Astroworld Festival. Nine-year-old Ezra Blount passed away Sunday, according to a statement released by his family‚Äôs attorney.

‚ÄúThe Blount family tonight is grieving the incomprehensible loss of their precious young son,‚Äù the Blount family attorney Ben Crump said in a statement. ‚ÄúThis should not have been the outcome of taking their son to a concert, what should have been a joyful celebration. Ezra‚Äôs death is absolutely heartbreaking. We are committed to seeking answers and justice for the Blount family. But tonight we stand in solidarity with the family, in grief, and in prayer.‚Äù

Blount was sitting on his father‚Äôs shoulders during Travis Scott‚Äôs headlining set on Friday night when the two suddenly found themselves trapped in a crowd surge. During the chaos, Blount‚Äôs father passed out and his son fell to the ground, where he was kicked, stepped on, and trampled.

Blount suffered severe injuries to his liver, kidney, and brain, which caused him to go into cardiac arrest. Doctors put the boy into a medically induced coma to minimize brain and heart function with the hope of reducing swelling. Unfortunately, the boy succumbed to his injuries on Sunday.

Prior to Ezra‚Äôs passing, the Blount family filed a lawsuit against Travis Scott and Live Nation, the producers of Astroworld. A GoFundMe had also been established to cover the cost of Blount‚Äôs medical bills. As of Sunday evening, the family had raised close to $70,000 in donations.

Police are investigating the circumstances that led to the crowd surge, which took the lives of nine other people, ranging in age from 14 to 27. Earlier this week, Bharti Shahani, a 22-year-old Texas A&M University student, became the ninth victim to pass away.

Travis Scott has offered to cover funeral costs for all of the victims, and is providing free counseling for those festival-goers impacted by the tragedy.

gts:
Test

‚Üí Demo Video

I got feedback from an in-class critique that a demo would be helpful. So, for user testing, I also prepared a demo video.

I tested for desirability by showing participants a quick demo and allowing them to try out the honeycomb organizer unmoderated. Afterwards, I asked two questions:

Is it easy to use?

Would you use it longterm?

They replied that they liked how simple and cute the design was. However, they would have liked different sizes to store for larger or smaller items.

Analysis

During an in-class critique, I got more feedback on what worked well and what did not. The shape was cute and popular. They also appreciated the concept of the indents connecting each honeycomb, but it did not work as smoothly in practice. Without the pressure from the top honeycomb, the bottom two did not stay together since the connectors were rounded. Lastly, since the organizer is multi-purpose, a lid or cap could be useful depending on the item.

Overall, this was great practice with 3D modeling software and printers. The actual prototype itself definitely needs more improvements. In the future, I will experiment with different sizes. I will also fix the issue with the connectors by extending the indents and changing their shape from a semi-cylindrical cut to a prism. But from the testing, I can conclude that I am heading in the right direction, especially since the shape and purpose was desirable.

gts:
Since Blockchain has taken over the world, there are many industries it has disrupted. One fine name is Esports. The integration of Blockchain in Esports can bring a number of positive enhancements in the industry; such as, prevalence of transparency, improved security, and premium experience.

Transparent Culture

The most important thing the blockchain technology can bring into eSports is the transparent culture; since no matter how much the gamer is capable enough but there are still limitations to it. Like, we still do not know how many successful gamers exist in this world. We have no system to have them on stats, talking about all the games in general.

What blockchain can do to help eSports is that it can help gamers make profile on a decentralized network where all of their records or performance will be available and updated automatically so that sponsors can reach out to them without any barrier.

High-End Security

There is significant amount of security issues in esports. Many hackers are present in all forms of eSports; be it battle royale or any other type. However, all the security concerns can be eliminated, if Blockchain applies its immutable technology into eSports. All the cheating and scams will be eradicated.

Better Experience

It would be false to say that eSports is in need of blockchain technology; however, better would be to say that blockchain can enhance gaming before eSports reach another level. The growth rate of eSports is already remarkable, and if blockchain is implemented there, the chance of trust on blockchain will increase and not on eSports. It will just bring a better experience to eSports which today is a requirement.

Future of Esports in Blockchain

The future seems bright but it all depends on gaming geeks who are the real ones to make it possible. Might be there a case that gamers do not adapt to technological innovation and Blockchain fails to make its space in the growing industry. Only time will tell what gamers adopt and what not.

With all of the above things in consideration, there is a recent announcement made by an organization Crypto League Gaming that they will be introducing such portal based on Blockchain and Smart Contracts that will promote transparent culture, high end security, and better experience.

gts:
Sidharth Shukla was an Indian actor, host and model who appeared in Hindi television and films.He was known for his roles in Balika Vadhu, Broken But Beautiful 3 and Dil Se Dil Tak. He became more famous after winning the reality show Bigg Boss 13. He also emerged as a winner of Fear Factor: Khatron Ke Khiladi. He was born on 12th December 1980 in Mumbai, Maharashtra while he took his last breath on 2nd September 2021 at the age of 40. He died of heart attack , saddening all his fans and loved ones. His death came as a shock for the whole nation. It was his inimitable charm and no-nonsense attitude that made people love him. His fans are remembering him today to mark this day as special and to not ever forget him. His girlfriend Shehnaaz Gill payed a loving tribute to him by dedicating the song ‚ÄúTu Yahin Hai‚Äù , which was sung in her own voice. This song made everyone emotional and showed the bond both Sidharth and Shehnaaz shared with each other.

Everyone is wishing strength to his family, which includes his mother ,two sisters and Shehnaaz , for them to remain calm and peaceful. We hope he is at peace wherever he is. Wishing him all goodness and prayers.

Delorians,

If you are here long enough you already know we have a thing about security. Securing the funds of each and every Revaulter is always on our mind in every step we take. This is why we went through 2 smart contract audits, have a proxy smart contract for every user, integrated Valid Networks Smart Widget, and enabled time lock on our contracts.

This time, we took it a step further. Allow me to present you with Revault Bug Bounty

Together with our great friends at Immunefi, we had just launched an extensive bug bounty, inviting all of you beautiful White hats over there to take your best shot at us and possibly get yourself a nice paycheck.

We want you to crack us open, looking at our smart contracts, website and app searching for vulnerabilities on several main topics considered critical. Please visit Revault‚Äôs page at Immunefi‚Äôs website for the full bounty description.

The rewards will be distributed according to the impact of the vulnerability based on the Immunefi Vulnerability Severity Classification System, and will be as follows:

Smart Contracts and Blockchain

Critical ‚Äî Up to 250,000$

High ‚Äî Up to 25,000$

Medium ‚Äî Up to 10,000$

Low ‚Äî Up to 5,000$

Web and App

Critical ‚Äî Up to 10,000$

WhatsApp's new crypto payment feature includes a pilot in the US, where users can use the Novi wallet for payments. This feature eliminates transfer fees and allows users to 'click-to-pay' directly from their WhatsApp interface. The pilot aims to simplify the process of integrating cryptocurrency payments into the WhatsApp ecosystem.
gts:
WhatsApp messenger tests cryptocurrency transactions. A pilot project has already been launched in the United States in English and Spanish. The operations are processed by the Meta ‚Äî Novi digital wallet. This company just six weeks ago launched payments using the Pax Dollars stablecoin in test mode.

Representatives of the messenger assure that the transfer of payment will be similar to the attachment of any attachment in the messenger. It is enough to click on the ‚Äúplus‚Äù and select ‚ÄúPayment‚Äù in the menu that appears. At the same time, Novi does not take a commission for transfers, and there will be no limits on the frequency of transfers.

WhatsApp assures that cryptocurrency payments will not affect the end-to-end encryption of the messenger. Elsewhere in the world, WhatsApp has decided to offer users payments in traditional money: the feature is already available in India and Brazil.

Stephane Kasriel on twitter:

‚ÄúWe often hear that people use WhatsApp to coordinate sending money to loved ones, and Novi enables people to do that securely, instantly and with no fees. Payments will appear directly in people‚Äôs chat.‚Äù

Meta, previously known as Facebook, has been working on the implementation of cryptocurrency payments inside of its apps for a long time after dropping its plans for the creation of its own digital currency due to regulatory concerns.

I can definitely help with that. Here are some basic makeup tips for dusky skin tones:

1. **Foundation**: Choose a foundation that matches your skin tone and has a natural finish. Opt for a shade that is slightly lighter than your natural skin tone to avoid looking too orange.

2. **Concealer**: Use a concealer that is one shade lighter than your foundation to cover any blemishes or dark circles. Blend it well to ensure a seamless look.

3. **Blush**: Apply a soft, natural blush to the apples of your cheeks. Choose a shade that complements your skin tone and adds a subtle flush.

4. **Eyelids**: Use a shimmery or matte eyeshadow to create a glossy look. Opt for shades that are slightly cooler to balance the warmth of dusky skin.

5. **Lip Shades**: For dusky skin, a nude or soft pink lip color works well. Avoid overly bold or bright shades as they can make the skin tone appear more orange.

Feel free to add any specific questions or details you'd like to include!
</response>
gts:
Photo by Amir Seilsepour on Unsplash

Dusky or Tanned skin has become the desire for many Americans. Not black-brown but a little darker than whitish skin tone. While every skin has its own beauty and glow. To categorize shades of color and makeup ideas, each skin color has attribute a name. Like The dusky tone. Remember there is nothing comparable when the skin is healthy and glowing.

To keep your skin accentuating and glowing, here are some makeup tips to consider to make a good change. Herbeautysecret has been showing some of the best ways to elevate the beauty with regular skin care tips

Photo by Jazmin Quaynor on Unsplash

Foundation

Foundation is the base of any makeup. And for dusky tone, it requires a little extra effort to find the right shade according to their skin tone. Never choose a shade lighter than your natural skin tone, it will make your skin look patch and dull. Foundation is used to create an even base not for brightening.

Concealer

Go for concealer and bronzers too. Add them in your makeup routine, to hide blemishes and highlight the face features. Carry out yourself with pride!

Blush

Its a myth that dusky tone should stay away from blush. Never skip it. Instead use some shades like rose, deep orange and coral. Try to avoid shades like brown and beige, as they won‚Äôt suit you. With Dusky tones you have to be a little careful with color choices.

Glossy Eyelids

The best way to highlight your eyes is to use glossy eyelids. Use a cream based eye shadow on your lids in coral, brown, or rose gold shade that will bring out the beauty of your beautiful dark eyes.

Lip Shade

When you choose your lipstick, look for deep and dark colors. The most suited colors like plum, maroon, burgundy and berry goes well with dusky complexion. If you like wearing nude shades, choose one that matches your skin tone. Too light a shade can make your face appear washed-out.

An Digital marketing company located in India offers a broad array of services under one roof for businesses that don‚Äôt have the expertise of digital marketing, nor the capacity to establish a full-time in-house digital marketing staff

Types of Digital Marketing Agencies

4. Social Media Agency

The reason you should work with an Digital Marketing Agency?

Digital marketing is different from traditional marketing. It is a constant process. Making your website appear at the top of results of search engines is only one aspect of the game. Maintaining it there is a constant work.

Digital marketing companies located in India use strategies such as SEO Search engine marketing (SEM) and Social Media Marketing (SMM) as well as content marketing and mobile marketing to ensure that your company‚Äôs website and your brand are always in the view of the digital consumer.

In reality the people who visit your website far more than they wish to know your phone number. In essence, they are interested in knowing more about you prior to the first contact has been made.

gts:
For Travel Professionals

A day in the life of a travel professional: you open up your email and receive a new RFP from a client ‚Äî you have 24‚Äì48 hours to turn around the proposal. In the proposal you need descriptions of supplier offerings, images, and pricing. You also need to ensure you are presenting the most attractive & unique offer to your client so you win the lead. How do you achieve this in a way that doesn‚Äôt have you pulling your hair out and losing sleep?

The answer: Reposite‚Äôs new Trips marketplace

Travel & event planners responsible for crafting custom & tailored itineraries can leverage the Reposite Trips Marketplace to create listings for each part of the itinerary that they need new suppliers. For example ‚Äî if you‚Äôre pulling together a 9 day custom itinerary for a group of 20 people in New York, but need ideas for dinner venues on the 6th night and group activities on the final day, you could create listings for each of these needs, and get matched with quality suppliers within just a few hours.

Once a listing is published, (whether for a hotel, transportation company, venue, activity, tour guide etc.) all of the matching suppliers within the Reposite network are notified of the need and are able to login and proactively submit their proposal and pricing for the given trip. This enables travel professionals to pick from multiple options, receive competitive pricing quickly, and keep proposals fresh.

gts:
Photo by Andr√© Fran√ßois McKenzie on Unsplash

Recently, the cryptocurrency Bitcoin reached 90 percent of its maximum offer. A study conducted by blockchain.com revealed that of the total distribution of 21 million Bitcoins, 18.89 million have already been mined and distributed to the market. The milestone comes almost 12 years after the first block, which consisted of 50 Bitcoins, was dug on January 9, 2009.

Bitcoin founder Satoshi Nakamoto has set the value of Bitcoin at 21 million, making cryptocurrency scarce for controlling inflation that may result from the unlimited supply. Bitcoin is ‚Äúmined‚Äù by miners who solve math problems to verify and validate the transaction block that takes place on its network. It is a process of adding new Bitcoins to the stream. After making a successful transaction set, the miner is rewarded with a Bitcoins block.

It should be noted that every four years the value of Bitcoin mining is being halved. So, when Nakamoto created Bitcoin, the reward for securing a block of transactions was 50 Bitcoins. In 2012- 25 Bitcoins and dropped to 12.5 in 2016 and by the end of 2024 miners are expected to earn only 1.56 Bitcoins. This process is called splitting and will continue until the last Bitcoin is mined.

It may seem that the world‚Äôs most popular cryptocurrency is on the verge of collapse, but from the halving schedules, it is predicted that the remaining 10 percent of bitcoins will continue until February 2140, according to blockchain.com.

After reaching 21 million, Bitcoin will be very scarce and miners will rely on transaction funds, instead of block earnings. Miners will start to earn more from the transactions that take place on these blockchains than the mines themselves.

It is noteworthy that Bitcoin is not just a cryptocurrency, but a blockchain network that processes transactions in a distributed platform. Therefore, has a lot more to use than just a crypto asset.

gts:
I streamed VALORANT non-stop since June 2nd 2020. In the 5 months since its release I prolly took a total of 5 days off. It was insane. I‚Äôd grind unrated. Then ranked got released and I stayed up till 5am just to be one of the first players to experience ranked. It was hell.

I calibrated Platinum 2. I think. I was determined to become the first Radiant in my region. Obviously that didn‚Äôt happen, but as I was grinding with ApexSG and anobrain I found this sort of new love for the game.

It was just‚Ä¶ fun.

Playing every single day for 3 months straight I was bound to regain my long lost CS skills. I had made a reputation for myself as a Reyna abuser. No, THE Reyna abuser. The whole country would be like ‚Äúoh shit it‚Äôs the Reyna abuser‚Ä¶‚Äù when they see me in their game, but anytime I play something like Omen or Jett, they‚Äôd see me as a boosted Immortal.

Apparently that was enough for some of the pro teams to consider me. Specifically two teams, whom each had an underaged player that couldn‚Äôt participate in the very first official VALORANT tournament by Riot Games. These two teams had approached me and asked me to stand in for them, and that was when my competitive spirit that I had buried since I was forced into early retirement resurfaced.

Dental X-Ray, also known as radiographs, help the dentist in diagnosing any flaw between and inside your teeth. It further helps them in visualizing the disease of teeth that can‚Äôt be seen with a simple oral exam.

Such an X-Ray is performed yearly to track the progress of dental treatment and condition of teeth and gums. Compared to adults, it is inevitable for children to have dental X-rays for monitoring the growth of adult teeth. Through this, a dentist will be able to give his judgment regarding pulling over the baby‚Äôs teeth to avoid any sort of complications.

Dental X-Ray can easily spot the trouble early in your teeth, gums, jaw, and mouth. Getting early treatment for such dental problems will alleviate pain and irritation. For Dental X-Ray, you can always reach out to us anytime.

How Does a Dental X-ray Work?

Dental X-Ray is often conducted during routine visits where it shows the crown portion of your teeth and finds out if any signs of decay. To conduct this X-Ray, a patient is asked to place a plate in between their teeth where the machine will be placed on either side of your face.

Secondly, Panoramic x-rays are also a part of dental health treatment. It is taken from the outside of your mouth that gives a bigger and clear picture of the oral cavity. It also includes pictures of the sinus area and jawbones to check if there‚Äôs any oral disorder.

Most importantly, these X Rays are safe and emit quite a lower level of radiation.

Which are the key problems that dental X-Ray detects?

Dental X Rays can detect-

‚Ä¢ Reveal bone loss or any infection in the bone

‚Ä¢ Infection in the small areas between the teeth

‚Ä¢ Helps in suggesting for dentures, braces, tooth implants, or any other dental procedure

‚Ä¢ Reveal abnormalities like cysts and tumor

‚Ä¢ Check if there‚Äôs enough space for new teeth fitting

Book an appointment for Dental X-Ray and maintain your oral hygiene under the guidance of professionals!

Sydney Sixers have been hit by injuries in the ongoing Big Bash League 2021‚Äì22. Tom Curran will miss the entire season due to a back injury and will return to the United Kingdom. Steve O‚ÄôKeefe has been ruled out for a ‚Äúshort term‚Äù, while Ben Manenti has also been ruled out of the tournament due to a neck stress fracture.

Also Read: Shafali Verma Trains Against Bowlers for the Short-Ball Game

A Troublesome hotspot in the back has Forced Curran to leave the Tournament and go home to rehab

A troublesome hotspot in the back has forced Curran to leave the tournament and go home for rehabilitation. Meanwhile, O‚ÄôKeefe strained his calf after a win over the Melbourne Stars at the MCG.

‚ÄúOn and off the field, those three guys play a big part for us and their presence around the team and on-field skills will be remembered by everyone in the group. But for us, we always look for 18-matches in our squad. We have ready players and we see this as an opportunity for others in our group.‚Äù

Also Read: Mohammad Rizwan Signs Sussex Agreement for T20 Blast

Tom Curran is One to Accept Challenges

‚ÄúWe pride ourselves on being a club and a team that accepts challenges. But to lose players of the caliber of Tom Curran and Ben. And keep SOK on the sidelines, will be a challenge for any team and those People are not easily replaced,‚Äù said captain Moises Henriques.

Henriques also emphasized that there is no need to press the panic button especially with some players coming back. ‚ÄúWe saw Ben Dwarshui recovering from injury this week. Jackson Bird is not far away and Sean Abbott is back after the birth of his daughter. So there‚Äôs no need to panic,‚Äù he added.

Also Read: Legspinner Sandeep Lamichhane Named as Captain of Nepal

‚ÄúThere are guys like Lloyd Pope and Mickey Edwards who really deserve an opportunity. But because of the strength of our list they didn‚Äôt get as many chances as they deserved, so it will be little time for those guys to play. is a part of.‚Äù

The Sixers, who top the table after three wins from four games. Will ‚Äúexplore replacement player options for the injury in the coming days‚Äù.

Here comes MetaHIVE, which upgrades this Play-to-Earn model to Engage-to-Earn gaming model with introducing MetaHIVE Gaming Portals opening gateway to other metaverses and bringing benefits to users and partner projects.

BeeLabs introduces MetaHIVE Gaming Portal, which will broaden the reach of our users to other metaverse projects, it can be used to explore gaming, fashion, 3D experiences, concerts being held in other metaverses and almost everything you can think of.

Metahive is excited to announce its strategic partnership with VISHV Space. Our users will be pleased to know this!

Users will be able to hold VISHV NFT in MetaHIVE metaverse and vice versa so they can access Vishv Space game directly from MetaHIVE AR browser.

Users can earn $MHIVE tokens by spending time in VISHV Space using MetaHIVE gaming portal with our Engage-to-Earn module.

Users will be able to win VISHV Space NFTs by exploring MetaHIVE global scale play to earn.

Last but not the least VISHV Prime Gaming HIVELand will be customized with the beautiful space assets and will be auctioned through partnership, a dedicated HIVELand just for Vishv Fans.

The team at BeeLabs is delighted to be partnering with such a dependable team at VISHV Space for our MetaHIVE project to be a pioneer in making a breakthrough in the blockchain gaming industry.

About VISHV Space:

VISHV Space is a NFT space game being built on Solana blockchain. They provide an open metaverse game where you can choose any PFP character in your wallets like apes, monkeys, pandas and explore the metaverse or fight NPC pirates to win tokens.

About MetaHIVE:

MetaHIVE is first ever global scale, augmented reality based platform powered by Solana blockchain. Anyone with a mobile device or smart glasses can enjoy an interactive augmented reality experience tailored to the current real-world GPS location. Users can develop 3D content in the metaverse, own the hosted space as an NFT and place it anywhere in the world.

MetaHIVE is setting a new standard for augmented reality.

It‚Äôs hard to even start this text about my first impressions as I have a lot of them.

A lot of good impressions.

Since I arrived, I was always in motion, doing something, going somewhere, meeting someone. I didn‚Äôt have much time alone reminiscing and recollecting my thoughts.

Now after a week I‚Äôm settling down a bit and soon I‚Äôll be writing and posting more texts and stories of my life here in Brazil.

My goal is to write a text every week about my Brazilian experience. I‚Äôll be doing my best to overcome my shyness, in order to write, to record and to share my life with anyone who might be interested.

This is what it all started‚Ä¶

First of all I can‚Äôt even begin to express my gratitude to the amazing people from @keric_cadca, @associazioneinco, @avesol.associacao and @icyebrasil for allowing me to get this once-in-a-lifetime opportunity.

I feel truly blessed and thankful that I am able to go for this exchange and work on Globers Project financed by the Erasmus+ program of the European Union and call Brazil, this spectacular country, my home for the next 12 months.

Hey, here's a revised version of your article:

**Common Workout Mistakes People Make**

1. **Ignoring Progress Tracking**: Regularly tracking your progress can help you stay motivated and make adjustments to your routine as needed.

2. **Varying Exercises**: Incorporate a mix of strength, cardio, and flexibility exercises to prevent boredom and maximize results.

3. **Overeating Before Workouts**: Avoid eating large meals close to your workout to prevent discomfort and poor performance.

4. **Proper Hydration**: Drink water before, during, and after workouts, but avoid excessive hydration as it can dilute electrolytes and cause cramps.

5. **No Alcohol**: Alcohol can impair your workout performance and recovery, so it's best to avoid it before and after workouts.

6. **Posture**: Maintain good posture during workouts to prevent injuries and ensure you're using the right muscles.

7. **Not Working Out on an Empty Stomach**: Eating a light snack before workouts can help fuel your body and improve performance.

8. **Stretching**: Include a warm-up and cool-down routine to improve flexibility and reduce the risk of injury.

Feel free to add any additional points you think are important!
</response>

Singles‚Äô Day is China‚Äôs spending event of the year, with sales reaching a record $115 billion in 2020.

As consumers shop, ecommerce employees and delivery companies work overtime to keep the spree going.

Distribution centers bear the brunt of the workload and have to move billions of packages in days.

Singles‚Äô Day proper started in China on Thursday, marking the beginning of the country‚Äôs largest online spending fest.

While this year‚Äôs event included a discount period on November 1, the true 24-hour sales frenzy traditionally launches on November 11, when consumers flood online shopping platforms like Alibaba‚Äôs Taobao and its rival JD.com.

Despite a crackdown this year from Beijing on lavish spending and consumer waste, reports creeping in from local media indicate Singles‚Äô Day is still going strong, with 382 brands each hitting $15 million in sales since the start of this year‚Äôs event.

Here are some photos that show how China moves billions of packages to hundreds of cities on its biggest spending day.

InPoker announces partnership with DareNFT, an NFT 2.0 protocol that brings innovation to the world of digital assets InPoker Nov 23, 2021¬∑2 min read

InPoker and DareNFT are pleased to announce they have entered into a strategic partnership to combine DareNFT‚Äôs innovative NFT ecosystem with InPoker ambitious e-sports vision.

DareNFT is an universal NFT 2.0 protocol for digital assets. DareNFT has developed a suite of products to address some of the challenges in the NFT landscape, including unrecognized benefits between NFTs, unrecognized relationships between NFT owners and hidden risks of NFT ownership. There are many content types out there and whereas the content types matter at application level, the licensing protocol layer is the same for all of them. Therefore, there is only one protocol needed to serve all.

The existing licencing processes of derivative content are mostly manual and time consuming. With an NFT 2.0 smart contract, these processes can be automated. Derivative content such as: song remixes, subtitled videos, edited images, learning contents, translated book often generates revenue from the rental and subscription business model. Creators can receive royalties from reproducer‚Äôs revenue via the NFT smart contract. This speeds up collaboration and sharing of benefits between the author and re-publisher, resulting in more income for both parties.

The advent of the NFT 2.0 protocol that DareNFT proposes can mark a new milestone for nonfungible tokens and the crypto market in general. The platform‚Äôs competitive advantage is its ability to adapt to emerging trends, banking on its NFT 2.0 protocol which is an essential element for building a thriving platform.

DareNFT will provide InPoker with the access to its ecosystem and the NFT marketplace where InPoker plans to list some of the Elite NFT membership cards. This long-term partnership marks a significant milestone in InPoker‚Äôs efforts to introduce the cutting edge technologies to online gaming.

Visit DareNFT: https://darenft.com/

Stay tuned for more exciting developments on https://www.inpoker.io

Join our official Telegram Channel here: https://t.me/influencerpoker

gts:
The Return of the Valorant Champions Tour Tournament in 2022

With the recent conclusion of the 2021 Valorant VCT Champions Tournament, competitive players are left asking‚Ä¶ what's next for the Valorant Competitive scene in 2022?

I can easily say that the competitive scene in 2021 for Valorant was a massive success. Valorant brought in the masses of audiences across the globe. Even with the disruption of the pandemic, the support and strength backed by several big organizations and influencers are going incredibly strong.

Riot Games has announced the road map for the Valorant Champions Tour for the 2022 year, but there are several exciting changes to look forward to in 2022.

2022 Valorant Champions Tour roadmap ‚Äî addition of Game Changers circuit

2022 VCT will keep the same three-tier system: Challengers, Masters, and Champions. Each Challenger stage will still have open-qualifiers. The game is still relatively new, so this is key to allowing new and fresh talent to emerge into the competitive scene. The new addition is Valorant Game Changes, which will be the first-ever international LAN tournament for female and non-binary professional gamers. In the competitive Valorant scene, we have seen several large e-sport organizations, such as C9 and TSM FTX, who have signed several all-female rosters. I believe that this is a huge milestone for the e-sport competitive scene as it creates a safe space that is driven by inclusivity.

Here‚Äôs a concise article on digital marketing for small business owners and entrepreneurs:

**What is Digital Marketing?**
Digital marketing involves leveraging online channels to promote products, services, and brands. It includes SEO, social media, and email marketing.

**Why is Digital Marketing Important?**
Digital marketing helps small businesses compete with larger corporations by leveling the playing field. It allows small businesses to reach a wider audience, manage their online presence, and build brand awareness.

**Key Strategies:**
1. **SEO (Search Engine Optimization)**: Improve your website‚Äôs visibility in search engine results pages (SERPs) to attract organic traffic.
2. **Social Media Marketing**: Utilize platforms like Facebook, Instagram, and LinkedIn to engage with your audience and promote your brand.
3. **Email Marketing**: Build an email list and send targeted messages to nurture leads and retain customers.

**How It Helps Small Businesses:**
- **Resource Access**: Digital marketing tools and platforms are more accessible to small businesses, making it easier to manage online presence and reach a broader audience.
- **Cost-Effective**: Compared to traditional marketing methods, digital marketing can be more cost-effective and targeted.

Feel free to ask any specific questions or provide more details if needed.
</response>
gts:
What is digital marketing?

Digital marketing is the advertising of a business, person, product, or service using online channels, electronic devices, and digital technologies. A few examples of it include social media, email, pay-per-click, search engine optimizations, and more.

Digital marketing is important because it helps you drive more qualified traffic. You reach more leads that are interested in your business. The ability to target specific leads helps you drive traffic that makes interest in your company or business. You can target leads specifically by different characteristics.

This industry is one of the fastest-growing sectors in technology. Such growth comes with incredible rewards and a commendable fortune for those who have the skills. It is also competitive since the skills are self-thought.

Digital marketing is the component of marketing that utilizes internet and online based digital technologies. Such as desktop computers mobile phones and other digital media and platforms to promote products and services.

Let‚Äôs talk about marketing goals and objectives are set by business house to promote, its good and services to its customers, within a specific timeframe. Marketing objectives are the planning to set to attain the overall growth of the organization.

When it comes to particular product, a company s marketing strategy may include increasing product awareness, providing information about product features, and reducing consumer resistance.

It provides small and medium businesses the chance to compete and attract their share of targeted traffic. Small companies now have the resources to perform sales and marketing processes that were earlier available to large corporate only.

At a high level digital marketing refers to advertising delivered through digital channels. Such as search engines, websites, social media, Email and mobile apps. Using these online media channels digital marketing is the method by which companies endorse goods services and brands.

gts:
In today‚Äôs world, identity theft is a major problem. If you have your identity stolen, it can take years to get it back. In order to avoid this, many people have started getting attestation services in Dubai.

These services are a type of authentication process in which the higher authorities validates a person‚Äôs identity. It can be used for a variety of things, including getting a driver‚Äôs license, opening a bank account, or for anything else where you need to prove your identity.

The attestation process starts with a person going to the embassy of the country they want to attest their identity. The embassy will then make a copy of the person‚Äôs passport and other documents.

Need of Attestation services in Dubai

Attestation services in Dubai are needed for a variety of purposes, such as obtaining a new passport, getting a residence visa, getting a new driver‚Äôs license, or opening a bank account.

They are also used for a variety of purposes, such as notarizing a document, witnessing a signature, authenticating a document, and more.

It is important to attest the authenticity of any document. This includes certificates, diplomas, transcripts, degrees, passports, visas, marriage certificates, birth certificates, wills, deeds, powers of attorney, or any other documents.

Why Genius Attestation Services?

There are many reasons to have documents attested. For example, you may need to have a birth certificate certified so that you can get a passport. You may need to have a diploma certified so that you can get a job.

You may need to have a will certified so that you can get a death certificate. There are many reasons to have documents attested.

At Genius Attestation Services, we can attest your documents quickly and easily. Attestation services in Dubai are a cost-effective and secure way to verify a person‚Äôs qualifications. The process is quick and affordable, and the attestation services in Dubai are trustworthy.

Marketing illustrations by Storyset

Working from home has numerous advantages, but also comes with its disadvantages.

Building a successful online business is a dream come true for many people around the world, though to some, it is not always fun and games.

Sources have it that you can survive on online businesses and enjoy the freedom of earning real money from your passions.

As earlier mentioned, running an online business is not always a walk in the park, and therefore it is wise not to underestimate the hard work that a successful online business requires.

To understand what it entails to run an online business, let us take a look at the Benefits and Costs of running online businesses.

Benefits of Running an Online Business

1) Flexible schedule and rules.

Owning an online job allows you to create your rules and be your boss. With the flexibility that comes with self-employment, one can even create time to see friends and family.

2) Low startup costs.

One key benefit of owning an online business is the low starting cost. Sources have it that you can start a website with less than $100, and as your business grows, you can invest more in it. An online business gives you the liberty of working from your house and requires no leasing costs. You do not have to worry about an employee‚Äôs salary too!

3) You become the boss.

Running your own online business gives you the mandate of setting the rules and regulations. Nobody tells you what to do, and you get an opportunity of controlling your destiny. You get to make decisions about marketing, product or service development, customer service, and pretty much everything related to your business.

Cost of Running an Online Business

1) Long working hours

For any business to succeed, it calls for hard work and long working hours. Starting an online job from scratch takes a good amount of time to be successful and in some cases, people are required to work on weekends to reach their targets.

2) Requires a lot of discipline.

With all the freedom that comes with running your own business, discipline is fundamental. The time one takes for breaks should be limited, and more focus should be made to reach the set target.

Store Credit Cards Can Be Helpful

But the tricky part lies when you are not paying the credit amount in time. Then the whole amount that‚Äôs billed over the furnishings would be charged with an interest.
